summary.en: Uptimer is a powerful serverless uptime monitoring platform built on Cloudflare's edge network. Leveraging Workers for HTTP/TCP probes, D1 for persistent storage, and Pages for real-time status display, it provides comprehensive monitoring capabilities. The platform supports multi-language status pages, customizable webhook notifications, incident management, and scheduled maintenance windows. With full-stack serverless architecture and automated CI/CD, it delivers zero-ops deployment while maintaining enterprise-grade reliability.

summary.en: CloudPaste is a Serverless self-hosted cloud storage built on Cloudflare Workers, aggregating 30+ storage backends including S3, OneDrive, and Google Drive with unified WebDAV mounting. It features a Vditor Markdown editor, 30+ file format previews, and edge computing acceleration across 300+ global nodes. Offering zero-maintenance deployment via Workers or Docker, it serves as an ideal solution for personal knowledge management and team collaboration.

summary.en: GitHubStarsIndex automates fetching GitHub starred repositories and generates AI-powered summaries with technical tags. Supporting incremental updates, concurrent processing, and Jinja2 templating, it outputs structured Markdown and interactive HTML pages with search functionality. The tool seamlessly syncs to Obsidian vaults or deploys to GitHub Pages with multilingual support, transforming scattered stars into a searchable, organized technical knowledge base for efficient asset management.

summary.en: GitNexus is a zero-server, client-side code intelligence engine that builds knowledge graphs directly in the browser. It analyzes dependencies, call chains, and execution flows to provide AI agents with deep architectural visibility, preventing missed code and broken dependencies. The CLI+MCP mode integrates with editors like Cursor and Claude Code for daily development, while the Web UI enables visual exploration. Built on KuzuDB and Tree-sitter, it features a Graph RAG Agent that gives smaller models architectural clarity comparable to large models, ideal for code review and AI-assisted development.

summary.en: NodeWarden is a serverless Bitwarden-compatible server built on Cloudflare Workers, designed for individual users. Leveraging D1 database and R2 storage, it enables zero-cost self-hosted password management with full official client support, TOTP authentication, and attachment handling. Unlike the official service, it unlocks premium features without a subscription, offering one-click deployment as a lightweight alternative for personal password management.

summary.en: This project leverages HuggingFace Spaces free hosting to automate 24/7 coin farming on Panel.NA1 platform. Key features include automatic check-in every minute, cookie auto-refresh, web monitoring dashboard, anti-idle keep-alive mechanism, and Telegram notifications via reverse proxy. Zero-cost deployment suits personal resource acquisition and serverless automation learning, effectively overcoming network restrictions while maintaining persistent operation through external health checks.

summary.en: Prompt Optimizer is a powerful AI application tool dedicated to prompt engineering optimization, supporting multi-model integration and MCP protocol compatibility. It significantly improves LLM output quality and stability through intelligent prompt refinement, real-time A/B testing, and advanced debugging features including context variables and function calling. The tool offers versatile deployment optionsâ€”Web, desktop, Chrome extension, and Dockerâ€”with a pure frontend architecture that ensures data security by processing everything client-side. Perfect for scenarios like roleplay simulation, knowledge graph extraction, and creative writing collaboration.

summary.en: This project enables native OpenClaw server execution on Android via Termux, eliminating proot-distro and Linux dependencies. It reduces storage overhead from 1-2GB to ~50MB, cuts setup time from 30 minutes to 3-10 minutes, and delivers native performance. The core value lies in repurposing idle Android devices into 24/7 low-power servers with built-in UPS protection and zero personal data risk. It's an ideal implementation for edge computing and device reuse, transforming old phones into efficient, always-on gateways with minimal resource consumption.

summary.en: OpenClaw brings the OpenClaw AI Gateway to Android via a standalone Flutter app and Termux CLI package. It uses proot to automatically set up an Ubuntu environment with Node.js 22 and OpenClaw, requiring no root access. The app features a built-in terminal emulator, embedded web dashboard, real-time log viewer, and gateway controls. It supports one-tap deployment, API key configuration, background foreground service, and optional installation of Go and Homebrew tools, turning Android devices into portable AI gateway nodes.

It offers multi-platform compatibility with Codex, Claude, Gemini, and Cursor, packaging instructions and scripts in self-contained folders for seamless AI coding agent integration.

summary.en: LobsterAI by NetEase Youdao is a 24/7 all-scenario AI personal assistant built on Electron+React. Its core Cowork mode executes tasks in local or Alpine sandbox environments, featuring built-in skills like Office document generation, Playwright automation, and Remotion video creation. It enables remote control via IM platforms (Telegram/Discord/DingTalk/Feishu), persistent memory, permission gating, and covers productivity scenarios including data analysis, presentation creation, and email management.

summary.en: Fastfetch is a high-performance system information tool written in C, designed as a modern, maintained alternative to neofetch with emphasis on performance and customizability. It supports over 10 operating systems including Linux, macOS, Windows, Android, and various BSD variants, delivering visually appealing output with extensive configuration options. Ideal for developers and sysadmins to display system details in terminals, it offers easy installation via major package managers and maintains active community development with regular updates.

summary.en: This script provides a one-click OS reinstall solution for VPS, supporting 19 Linux distributions and Windows official ISO cross-installation between Linux and Windows systems. It uses partition table ID to identify disks ensuring operation safety, intelligently configures static/dynamic networking for special environments like /32, pure IPv6, and IPv4/IPv6 on different NICs. Optimized for low-resource VPS with minimal memory footprint, it supports BIOS/EFI and ARM architectures, sourcing all resources directly from official mirrors in real-time without custom packages.

summary.en: StreamGet is a lightweight Python library for real-time live stream acquisition, supporting HLS/FLV protocols across 40+ platforms including Douyin, TikTok, Bilibili, and Xiaohongshu. It provides a unified async API that eliminates platform-specific parsing logic, enabling rapid development of live stream monitoring, data collection, content analysis, and automated recording applications while significantly reducing development complexity.

summary.zh: Re_edgetunnel æ˜¯åŸºäº Cloudflare Workers çš„å…¨æ¨¡å—åŒ–éš§é“ä»£ç†æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œå½»åº•é‡æ„äº†åŸæœ‰å•æ–‡ä»¶æ¶æ„ã€‚æ”¯æŒ VLESSã€Trojan ä¸»æµåè®®ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨ ESM æ¨¡å—æ ‡å‡†ä¸ Wrangler CLI å·¥ç¨‹åŒ–éƒ¨ç½²ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨ KV å­˜å‚¨ç®¡ç†çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œæä¾›è‡ªåŠ¨è®¢é˜…é“¾æ¥ç”Ÿæˆï¼Œä¸“ä¸ºäºŒæ¬¡å¼€å‘å’Œå­¦ä¹  Worker å¼€å‘è®¾è®¡ï¼Œé€‚é… Clashã€Sing-box ç­‰å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ã€‚
summary.en: Re_edgetunnel is a fully modular tunnel proxy solution built on Cloudflare Workers that completely refactors the original single-file architecture into maintainable ESM modules. Supporting mainstream protocols including VLESS and Trojan, it adopts modern development standards with Wrangler CLI for streamlined deployment, utilizes Cloudflare KV for persistent state management, and automatically generates subscription links compatible with Clash, Sing-box, and Surge clients. This project serves as an ideal paradigm for secondary development and learning advanced Worker development with WebSocket communication technologies across edge networks.

summary.en: CC Switch is a cross-platform desktop application built with Tauri 2 that unifies management of AI coding assistants including Claude Code, Codex, and Gemini CLI. It eliminates workflow fragmentation by centralizing API relay configurations and model switching in a single interface. The lightweight, secure app runs on Windows, macOS, and Linux, streamlining AI-powered development and boosting developer productivity through consolidated tool management.

metadata.name: zvec
metadata.description: A lightweight, lightning-fast, in-process vector database

summary.zh: Zvec æ˜¯é˜¿é‡Œå·´å·´å¼€æºçš„è½»é‡çº§è¿›ç¨‹å†…å‘é‡æ•°æ®åº“ï¼ŒåŸºäºå†…éƒ¨éªŒè¯çš„ Proxima æœç´¢å¼•æ“æ„å»ºã€‚å®ƒæä¾›æ¯«ç§’çº§åäº¿å‘é‡ç›¸ä¼¼æ€§æ£€ç´¢ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¯†é›†/ç¨€ç–å‘é‡ä¸æ··åˆæŸ¥è¯¢ï¼Œæ— éœ€ç‹¬ç«‹æœåŠ¡å³å¯ç›´æ¥åµŒå…¥åº”ç”¨ã€‚é€‚ç”¨äºæ¨èç³»ç»Ÿã€è¯­ä¹‰æœç´¢ç­‰åœºæ™¯ï¼Œå…·å¤‡ç”Ÿäº§çº§æ€§èƒ½ã€ä½å»¶è¿Ÿä¸æç®€éƒ¨ç½²çš„æ ¸å¿ƒä¼˜åŠ¿ã€‚
summary.en: Zvec is a lightweight, open-source in-process vector database developed by Alibaba, powered by the battle-tested Proxima search engine. It provides millisecond-level similarity search for billions of vectors, natively supporting dense and sparse embeddings with hybrid search combining semantic and structured filters. As an embeddable library, it requires no standalone server and runs directly within applications. Ideal for recommendation systems, semantic search, and edge AI scenarios, Zvec delivers production-grade performance, low latency, and effortless deployment across platforms from cloud servers to edge devices.

summary.zh: PageIndex æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ›æ–°çš„å‘é‡æ— å…³ã€åŸºäºæ¨ç†çš„ RAG ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œä¸“ä¸ºä¸“ä¸šé•¿æ–‡æ¡£è®¾è®¡ã€‚å®ƒæ‘’å¼ƒä¼ ç»Ÿå‘é‡æ•°æ®åº“å’Œåˆ†å—ç­–ç•¥ï¼Œé€šè¿‡æ„å»ºå±‚æ¬¡åŒ–æ ‘å½¢ç´¢å¼•å¹¶æ¨¡æ‹Ÿäººç±»ä¸“å®¶æ¨ç†è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼Œå®ç°ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æ„ŸçŸ¥çš„æ™ºèƒ½æ£€ç´¢ã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒä¼˜åŠ¿åœ¨äºå°†ç›¸ä¼¼åº¦æœç´¢å‡çº§ä¸ºç›¸å…³æ€§æ¨ç†ï¼Œæ”¯æŒè§†è§‰åŸºç¡€ OCR è‡ªç”±çš„å·¥ä½œæµï¼Œå¹¶æä¾› MCP é›†æˆï¼Œæ˜¾è‘—æå‡å¤æ‚æ–‡æ¡£çš„æ£€ç´¢å‡†ç¡®æ€§ä¸æ·±åº¦ç†è§£èƒ½åŠ›ã€‚
summary.en: PageIndex is a vectorless, reasoning-based RAG framework designed for professional long documents. It replaces traditional vector databases and chunking with a hierarchical tree index, enabling LLMs to perform agentic, human-like retrieval through tree search reasoning. By prioritizing relevance over similarity, it supports OCR-free vision-based workflows and MCP integration, delivering superior accuracy for domain-intensive document analysis.

summary.en: FastAPI-based proxy API for Grok AI, fully adapted to the latest web calling format. Supports streaming/non-streaming conversations, image generation/editing, and deep thinking with built-in account pool concurrency and auto load balancing. Offers Cloudflare Workers serverless deployment with D1 database and KV storage integration. Features visual admin panel, auto-registration with Turnstile solver, intelligent token status detection, and consistent behavior across local, Docker, and serverless deployments.

summary.en: nginx-flow is a visual Nginx config editor built on React Flow, transforming manual configuration into drag-and-drop canvas programming with server/location/upstream nodes. It features production-ready templates for SPA, reverse proxy, load balancing, and smart audit engine that auto-detects security risks and performance issues with one-click fixes. Real-time config preview, traffic simulation, and bilingual support streamline DevOps workflows, reducing errors and accelerating deployment.

metadata.name: beancount
metadata.description: Beancount: Double-Entry Accounting from Text Files.

summary.zh: Beancount æ˜¯ä¸€ç§åŸºäºæ–‡æœ¬çš„å¤å¼è®°è´¦é¢†åŸŸç‰¹å®šè¯­è¨€ï¼Œå°†ä¼šè®¡é€»è¾‘ä»£ç åŒ–ã€‚é€šè¿‡çº¯æ–‡æœ¬æ–‡ä»¶å®šä¹‰äº¤æ˜“è®°å½•ï¼Œæ”¯æŒè‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–æŠ¥å‘Šç”Ÿæˆå’Œ Web ç•Œé¢å±•ç¤ºï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºä¸ªäººç†è´¢ä¸ä¸­å°ä¼ä¸šè®°è´¦ã€‚v3 ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¿æŒæç®€ä¸»ä¹‰è®¾è®¡ï¼Œå¼ºè°ƒæŒä¹…æ€§ä¸å¯ç¼–ç¨‹æ€§ï¼Œä¸ºå¼€å‘è€…æä¾›çµæ´»çš„è´¢åŠ¡ç®¡ç†å·¥å…·ã€‚
summary.en: Beancount is a text-based domain-specific language for double-entry bookkeeping that codifies accounting logic into plain text files. It enables automated report generation and provides a web interface for visualization. Designed for personal finance and small business accounting, Beancount emphasizes minimalism, durability, and programmability. The current stable v3 version offers developers a flexible, scriptable financial management tool that treats accounting as code, ensuring long-term data portability and extensibility.

summary.en: Tomiya233/grok2api wraps xAI's Grok model into OpenAI API-compatible interfaces using FastAPI. Key features include: asynchronous streaming architecture for high concurrency, intelligent token pool management with auto load balancing, automatic caching to bypass 403 restrictions, and comprehensive admin dashboard with statistics. Enables developers to integrate Grok into existing AI applications or build highly available Grok services with enterprise-grade reliability.

summary.en: Chaterm is an AI-native intelligent terminal agent designed as a DevOps co-pilot. It revolutionizes the command-line experience through natural language interaction, featuring a built-in expert knowledge base and autonomous agent engine capable of planning and executing complex workflows from log analysis to service rollback. It manages EC2 instances, databases, and Kubernetes clusters while offering intelligent contextual completion and real-time voice interaction on mobile devices, empowering developers with SRE-level operational capabilities.

Designed for medium-to-large monolithic applications, it helps teams build consistent, scalable API systems while avoiding architectural pitfalls.

summary.en: UI UX Pro Max Skill is an AI-powered design intelligence tool that automatically generates professional design systems using 100 reasoning rules and 67 UI style libraries. Featuring a Python-based CLI, it analyzes project requirements and outputs customized UI/UX solutionsâ€”from hero-centric conversion patterns to soft UI evolution stylesâ€”enabling rapid creation of cohesive, production-ready design systems across web and mobile platforms while dramatically improving design efficiency, ensuring brand consistency, and reducing development iteration cycles.

metadata.name: OneManager-php
metadata.description: An index & manager of Onedrive based on serverless. Can be deployed to Vercel/Heroku/SCF/FG/FC/CFC/PHP web hosting/VPS.

summary.zh: ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäºServerlessæ¶æ„çš„Onedriveæ–‡ä»¶ç®¡ç†å™¨ï¼Œæ”¯æŒVercelã€HerokuåŠå›½å†…äº‘å‡½æ•°å¹³å°éƒ¨ç½²ã€‚é€šè¿‡ç”Ÿæˆç›´é“¾å®ç°ç”¨æˆ·ç›´ä¼ ç›´ä¸‹è½½ï¼Œå¤§å¹…èŠ‚çœæœåŠ¡å™¨å¸¦å®½æˆæœ¬ã€‚æä¾›å¯è§†åŒ–æ–‡ä»¶ç®¡ç†ç•Œé¢ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šç”¨æˆ·ã€å¤šç›®å½•ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºä¸ªäººäº‘ç›˜åˆ†äº«ã€å›¢é˜Ÿæ–‡æ¡£åä½œåŠé™æ€èµ„æºæ‰˜ç®¡åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: A serverless-based OneDrive index and manager that enables seamless deployment across Vercel, Heroku, and major Chinese cloud function platforms including Tencent SCF, Huawei FG, Alibaba FC, and Baidu CFC. The system generates direct URLs allowing end-users to upload and download files directly through Microsoft's infrastructure, minimizing server bandwidth consumption to near zero. With an intuitive web interface supporting multi-user access and directory management, it transforms OneDrive into a fully functional cloud storage portal suitable for personal file sharing, team collaboration, and static website hosting. Its PHP implementation ensures broad compatibility with various hosting environments while maintaining low operational costs.

summary.en: AntigravityQuotaWatcher is a VS Code extension that provides real-time quota monitoring for Antigravity AI platform users. It automatically detects service ports and authentication credentials, displays remaining quotas for various AI models in the status bar, and offers smart alerts when quotas are low. The built-in Dashboard panel provides quota overview, connection status, and weekly limit testing features, helping developers effectively manage AI resources and prevent development interruptions.

summary.en: Production-ready Next.js + Cloudflare full-stack starter for edge computing. Leverages vinext for 4x faster builds and 57% smaller bundles, deeply integrating D1 database, R2 storage, KV cache, and Analytics Engine. Features better-auth authentication, next-intl i18n, Vitest testing, and complete CI/CD pipeline with production-grade environment validation, structured logging, and automated migration verification. Ideal for high-performance, low-cost, globally-deployed modern web applications.

summary.en: LightRAG is a retrieval-augmented generation framework from HKUST, emphasizing simplicity and speed. It simplifies RAG implementation while significantly improving retrieval and generation performance through innovative architecture. Recent updates integrate RAGAS for evaluation and Langfuse for tracing, support efficient large-scale dataset processing, and enhance knowledge graph extraction capabilities. Designed for AI applications requiring rapid deployment of high-quality RAG systems with production-ready observability and scalability.

summary.en: This is an open-source privacy browser based on Ungoogled Chromium, specifically engineered to resist browser fingerprinting. The project offers pre-compiled binaries for Chromium versions 138 through 144, supporting Windows, Linux, and macOS. By deeply removing Google services and enhancing anti-fingerprinting protections, it effectively prevents fingerprint collection while maintaining Chromium's core functionality. Perfect for anonymous browsing and multi-account management requiring strong privacy controls.

summary.en: This is an automated system reinstallation toolkit centered around the InstallNET.sh script. It enables one-command network-based reinstallation of Debian, Ubuntu, CentOS, AlmaLinux, RockyLinux, Kali, Alpine Linux, and Windows 11 via command line. Designed for rapid VPS and bare-metal server deployment, it runs with minimal dependencies (wget only) and automatically handles distribution-specific package management differences. Provides default SSH/RDP configurations and is optimized for resource-constrained environments (Alpine requires just 256MB RAM), making it ideal for sysadmins managing batch operations and system recovery.

summary.en: Datawhale's 'Hello-Agents' delivers a comprehensive, hands-on tutorial for building AI Native Agents from first principles, filling the gap in systematic Agent development resources. The curriculum spans core architectures, classic paradigms (ReAct, Plan-and-Solve, Reflection), low-code platforms (Coze/Dify), mainstream frameworks (AutoGen/LangGraph), self-developed HelloAgents framework, model training (SFT/GRPO), and production-ready projects like intelligent travel assistants. Designed to transform LLM users into proficient Agent system architects through practical implementation.

summary.en: JdBuyer is a Python-based cross-platform automation assistant for JD.com flash sales. It provides 24/7 stock monitoring, automatic order placement, and WeChat notifications. The tool features QR code login, GUI support for Windows/macOS, and handles pre-sale deposits. Users configure SKU/AreaID for precise targeting, making it effective for seckill events and out-of-stock tracking, giving regular buyers equal opportunity against automated scalpers.

metadata.name: onedrive-index

summary.en: A OneDrive directory listing solution built with Next.js and Vercel, featuring one-click deployment. By migrating configurations to Vercel environment variables, it eliminates manual config file editing, enabling rapid setup. Offers file preview and download capabilities, supports password-protected folders, and enhances OAuth security by auto-closing authentication channels.

summary.en: Shadcn Builder is a powerful no-code form builder specifically designed for the shadcn/ui component library. It enables developers to visually create beautiful, accessible forms through drag-and-drop interface with live preview, then exports clean, production-ready React + Tailwind CSS code. With zero configuration required and seamless shadcn/ui integration, it dramatically accelerates frontend development while maintaining code quality and type safety.

summary.en: PAI is an agentic AI infrastructure designed to magnify human capabilities through composable AI workflows. Version 3.0 introduces constraint extraction, build drift prevention, and parallel loop execution with persistent PRD management. Built on TypeScript and Bun runtime, it provides an end-to-end solution for developing and deploying personalized AI agents, enabling everyone to create their own AI-augmented productivity stack.

summary.en: An AI-native PPT generator built on nano banana pro, pioneering the 'Vibe PPT' concept. It enables creation via natural language prompts, outlines, or page descriptions, with intelligent material parsing and custom template support. Features vocal modification, one-click editable PPTX/PDF export, breaking traditional tools' homogeneity. Ideal for business proposals, educational content, and student projects, democratizing professional presentation design.

summary.en: 3FUI is a professional interactive shell for FFmpeg on Windows, developed with .NET 10 and WinForm. It integrates 40+ video encoders (including hardware acceleration), 20+ audio and 10+ image encoders, supporting deep custom parameters and unlimited batch processing. Designed for professionals seeking transparent control and high-quality output, it features a clean dark-mode interface, is ad-free and completely free. Users must provide their own FFmpeg binary for optimal performance.

summary.en: Open Lovable is an open-source AI-powered React app generator by the Firecrawl team. It enables instant cloning and modernization of any website into React applications through conversational AI interaction. The project integrates Firecrawl for web scraping, multiple LLM providers (OpenAI/Anthropic/Gemini/Groq), and sandbox environments (Vercel/E2B) to transform URLs into runnable code within seconds, supporting rapid prototyping and website migration with real-time preview capabilities.

metadata.name: Web-Dev-For-Beginners

summary.en: Microsoft's official 12-week web development curriculum designed for absolute beginners, featuring 24 comprehensive lessons covering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript fundamentals. Employs project-based learning methodology through practical projects including terrariums, browser extensions, and space games. Features automated multi-language translation support for 40+ languages via GitHub Actions. Open-source and community-driven with quizzes, discussions, and assignments. Perfect for aspiring developers, educators, and self-learners seeking structured, hands-on web development training.

metadata.name: strix

summary.en: Strix is an open-source AI-powered security agent that simulates real hackers to dynamically discover and validate application vulnerabilities. Key features include: collaborative agent teams for efficient scanning, real PoC generation eliminating false positives, one-click autofix capabilities, and seamless CI/CD integration. Ideal for rapid penetration testing, bug bounty automation, and application security testing, dramatically accelerating security remediation.

summary.en: Cloudflare VibeSDK is an open-source AI-powered full-stack app generator built entirely on Cloudflare's developer platform. It enables natural language-driven React+TypeScript+Tailwind application creation with one-click deployment to Workers. Key features include AI error correction, sandboxed live previews, multi-LLM gateway integration, and customizable component librariesâ€”ideal for internal tools, SaaS extensions, and customer-facing AI platforms.

summary.en: Serverless-dns is a self-hosted, serverless DNS resolver with Pi-Hole-like content blocking, supporting DNS-over-HTTPS (DoH) and DNS-over-TLS (DoT). It deploys effortlessly to edge platforms including Cloudflare Workers, Deno Deploy, Fastly, and Fly.io. The free tiers suffice for 10-20 devices monthly. Server processing takes 0-2ms, with end-to-end latency of 10-30ms (median), enabling global low-latency DNS resolution.

metadata.name: flowsint

summary.en: Flowsint is an open-source OSINT graph investigation platform designed for cybersecurity analysts and investigators. It enables visual exploration of entity relationships through an interactive graph interface, powered by 20+ automated enrichers covering domains, IPs, social media, cryptocurrency, and breach data. Built with a modular microservices architecture featuring FastAPI backend, Celery task orchestration, and local deployment for privacy, it provides flexible threat intelligence and digital forensics capabilities while emphasizing ethical use and transparency.

It enables multi-threaded subset of otf, ttf, and woff2 fonts, allowing for precise control over package size.

summary.zh: cn-font-split æ˜¯ä¸“ä¸ºWebåœºæ™¯æ‰“é€ çš„å­—ä½“å­é›†åŒ–å·¥å…·ï¼Œé€šè¿‡Rustæ ¸å¿ƒä¸WebAssemblyæŠ€æœ¯å®ç°ç§’çº§åˆ‡å‰²ã€‚é’ˆå¯¹ä¸­æ–‡ç­‰CJKå­—ç¬¦é›†å¤§åŒ…ä½“ç§¯ç—›ç‚¹ï¼Œæä¾›ç»†ç²’åº¦å­—ç¬¦æ‹†åˆ†ä¸å¤šçº¿ç¨‹å¤„ç†ï¼Œæ”¯æŒOTF/TTF/WOFF2æ ¼å¼åŠå¯å˜å­—ä½“ã€‚è·¨å¹³å°ä¸€è‡´æ€§è¾“å‡ºï¼Œé›†æˆViteç­‰å‰ç«¯å·¥å…·é“¾ï¼Œæ˜¾è‘—ä¼˜åŒ–ç½‘é¡µå­—ä½“åŠ è½½æ€§èƒ½ã€‚
summary.en: cn-font-split is a revolutionary font subsetting engine designed for web font optimization, particularly for massive CJK character sets. Built with Rust and WebAssembly, it enables fine-grained character-level splitting with multi-threaded processing, achieving 50ms latency for 2MB fonts. Supporting OTF/TTF/WOFF2 formats, variable fonts, and complex glyph rendering via Harfbuzz integration, it delivers consistent outputs across browsers, Node.js, Deno, Bun, and native platforms. The tool integrates seamlessly with Vite, Webpack, and other frontend toolchains, eliminating render-blocking font loading while reducing bundle sizes by up to 90% and supporting 95+ OpenType features.

Solves the lack of autoindex on static hosting platforms, ideal for creating browsable file indexes with zero server-side logic.

metadata.name: miroflow
metadata.description: MiroFlow is an agent framework that enables tool-use agent tasks, featuring a reproducible GAIA score of 82.4%.

summary.zh: MiroFlow æ˜¯ MiroMindAI å¼€æºçš„ç ”ç©¶ä»£ç†æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œä¸“æ³¨äºå¤šæ­¥éª¤äº’è”ç½‘ç ”ç©¶ä»»åŠ¡ã€‚è¯¥æ¡†æ¶åœ¨ GAIA åŸºå‡†æµ‹è¯•ä¸­å®ç° 82.4% çš„å¯å¤ç°æ€§èƒ½ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨ FutureX æœªæ¥äº‹ä»¶é¢„æµ‹æ¦œå•æ’åç¬¬ä¸€ã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒèƒ½åŠ›åŒ…æ‹¬å·¥å…·ä½¿ç”¨ã€å¤æ‚æ¨ç†å’Œæ–‡æ¡£åˆ†æï¼Œé…å¥— 14.7 ä¸‡æ¡é«˜è´¨é‡è®­ç»ƒæ•°æ® MiroVerseï¼Œä¸ºæ„å»ºé«˜æ€§èƒ½ç ”ç©¶å‹ AI ä»£ç†æä¾›å®Œæ•´è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚
summary.en: MiroFlow is an open-source research agent framework developed by MiroMindAI, specifically designed for multi-step internet research and complex problem-solving tasks such as future event prediction. The framework achieves a reproducible GAIA benchmark score of 82.4% and currently ranks #1 on the FutureX leaderboard. Key technical capabilities include sophisticated tool-use mechanisms, multi-step reasoning chains, and intelligent document analysis. It is complemented by MiroVerse, a premium dataset of 147K training samples, providing a comprehensive solution for building high-performance research AI agents with state-of-the-art performance across multiple benchmarks.

metadata.name: agent-lightning

summary.zh: Agent Lightningæ˜¯å¾®è½¯å¼€æºçš„AIæ™ºèƒ½ä½“è®­ç»ƒæ¡†æ¶ï¼Œæ ¸å¿ƒå–ç‚¹æ˜¯å‡ ä¹æ— éœ€ä»£ç å˜æ›´å³å¯ä¼˜åŒ–ä»»æ„æ™ºèƒ½ä½“ã€‚å®ƒæ”¯æŒLangChainã€AutoGenã€CrewAIç­‰ä¸»æµæ¡†æ¶ï¼Œç”šè‡³çº¯Python OpenAIä»£ç ã€‚æ¡†æ¶é‡‡ç”¨å¼ºåŒ–å­¦ä¹ ã€è‡ªåŠ¨æç¤ºä¼˜åŒ–ç­‰ç®—æ³•ï¼Œå¯é’ˆå¯¹æ€§åœ°ä¼˜åŒ–å¤šæ™ºèƒ½ä½“ç³»ç»Ÿä¸­çš„å•ä¸ªæˆ–å¤šä¸ªæ™ºèƒ½ä½“ï¼Œæ˜¾è‘—æå‡æ™ºèƒ½ä½“æ€§èƒ½ã€‚
summary.en: Agent Lightning is Microsoft's open-source AI agent training framework that optimizes agents with minimal code changes. It supports any agent framework including LangChain, AutoGen, CrewAI, or even raw Python OpenAI code. The framework employs reinforcement learning, automatic prompt optimization, and supervised fine-tuning to selectively enhance individual or multiple agents within multi-agent systems. Its key innovation lies in framework-agnostic compatibility and zero-code optimization, enabling developers to rapidly improve agent performance without rebuilding existing implementations.

summary.en: An open multilingual dictionary rebuilding from Wiktionary with LLM-enhanced definitions. Its architecture processes 10M+ entries via streaming pipeline, featuring automated partitioning, data cleaning, and 50-concurrent LLM calls for generating learner-friendly structured content. Optimized with TOON format reducing token usage by 30-60%. Ideal for language learning apps and NLP data augmentation.

summary.en: DeepAudit is China's first open-source AI multi-agent code auditing system that democratizes vulnerability discovery through autonomous collaborative auditing and automated sandbox PoC validation. Supporting Ollama private deployment with one-click operation and visual reporting, it has discovered 49 CVEs in production. Ideal for enterprise security self-checks, open-source project auditing, and security research.

summary.zh: RealityCheckeræ˜¯ä¸“ä¸ºV2Ray Realityåè®®è®¾è®¡çš„ç›®æ ‡åŸŸåæ£€æµ‹å·¥å…·ã€‚é€šè¿‡å¤šç»´åº¦æ‰«æï¼ˆTLS 1.3/X25519æ”¯æŒã€è¯ä¹¦æœ‰æ•ˆæ€§ã€SNIåŒ¹é…ã€CDNè¯†åˆ«ã€åœ°ç†ä½ç½®åŠè¢«å¢™æ£€æµ‹ï¼‰ï¼Œå¿«é€Ÿç­›é€‰å‡ºé€‚åˆä½œä¸ºRealityç›®æ ‡çš„ä¼˜è´¨åŸŸåã€‚æ”¯æŒæ‰¹é‡æ£€æµ‹ä¸æ™ºèƒ½æŠ¥å‘Šï¼Œæœ‰æ•ˆè§„é¿çƒ­é—¨ç½‘ç«™å’ŒCDNé£é™©ï¼Œæ˜¯æ­å»ºç¨³å®šä»£ç†æœåŠ¡çš„å¿…å¤‡å·¥å…·ã€‚
summary.en: RealityChecker is a specialized domain validation tool designed exclusively for V2Ray Reality protocol. It performs comprehensive multi-dimensional scans including TLS 1.3/X25519 support verification, certificate validity and SNI matching checks, CDN detection, geolocation analysis, and GFW blocking status assessment. The tool enables batch processing of domains and generates intelligent reports to identify optimal Reality targets while filtering out high-risk candidates such as popular websites and CDN-hosted domains. With its ability to detect subtle technical characteristics, it serves as an essential utility for building stable, secure, and high-performance proxy configurations.

summary.en: GodSVG is a structured SVG editor that fundamentally differs from traditional tools by directly manipulating SVG source code without metadata overhead. It enables real-time bidirectional sync between visual editing and code view, producing clean, precise, and highly optimized vector files. Designed for designers and developers requiring pixel-perfect control, it runs on desktop and web platforms in late alpha stage.

metadata.name: neko

summary.en: Neko is a self-hosted virtual browser running in Docker, streaming desktop via WebRTC. It offers a secure, isolated browsing environment with multi-user access, ideal for privacy protection, team collaboration, and social entertainment (e.g., watch parties). Designed to overcome instability of traditional sharing tools like Discord, it provides a stable, low-latency solution for remote interaction.

summary.en: notion-2api is a high-performance proxy service that transforms Notion AI's unofficial backend into a fully compatible OpenAI API interface. Leveraging FastAPI and cloudscraper, it automatically bypasses Cloudflare protection while implementing advanced anti-detection mechanisms. The solution supports real-time streaming responses (stream=true) and maintains session state across multiple models. With Docker-based deployment, developers can instantly provision a private API endpoint, enabling any OpenAI-compatible application or script to harness Notion AI's capabilities without official API access.

metadata.name: AutoHotkey

summary.zh: AutoHotkeyæ˜¯Windowså¹³å°å¼€æºè‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–è„šæœ¬å·¥å…·ï¼Œä¸“æ³¨äºå®åˆ›å»ºä¸é‡å¤ä»»åŠ¡è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–ã€‚é‡‡ç”¨è‡ªå®šä¹‰è„šæœ¬è¯­è¨€ï¼Œæä¾›å¼ºå¤§çš„çƒ­é”®å®šä¹‰ã€å¿«æ·é”®é‡æ˜ å°„åŠGUIè‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–èƒ½åŠ›ã€‚åŸºäºC++å¼€å‘ï¼Œæ”¯æŒVisual Studioç¼–è¯‘ï¼Œå…¼å®¹Unicode/ANSIã€‚v2ç‰ˆæœ¬æŒç»­æ›´æ–°ï¼Œv1ç”±ç¤¾åŒºç»´æŠ¤ï¼Œæ”¯æŒWindows XPè‡³11ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œæ˜¯æå‡å·¥ä½œæ•ˆç‡çš„åˆ©å™¨ã€‚
summary.en: AutoHotkey is a powerful open-source automation scripting tool for Windows, specializing in macro creation and repetitive task automation. It features a custom scripting language with robust hotkey definition capabilities, enabling keyboard shortcut remapping, automated operations, and GUI scripting. Developed in C++, it supports compilation via Visual Studio and VS Code, with Unicode/ANSI compatibility. The actively maintained v2 branch coexists with community-supported v1, supporting Windows XP through 11. It's an essential utility for enhancing productivity through automation.

summary.zh: æœ¬æ•™ç¨‹æºè‡ªä¸Šæµ·äº¤å¤§è¯¾ç¨‹ï¼Œæä¾›å¤§æ¨¡å‹å…¨æ ˆå®è·µæŒ‡å—ã€‚æ¶µç›–å¾®è°ƒéƒ¨ç½²ã€æç¤ºå·¥ç¨‹ã€çŸ¥è¯†ç¼–è¾‘ã€æ•°å­¦æ¨ç†ã€æ¨¡å‹æ°´å°ã€è¶Šç‹±æ”»å‡»ç­‰å‰æ²¿ä¸»é¢˜ã€‚æ¯ä¸ªç« èŠ‚é…å¥—Jupyter Notebookè„šæœ¬ä¸è¯¾ä»¶ï¼Œæ”¯æŒåä¸ºæ˜‡è…¾å›½äº§åŒ–å¹³å°ã€‚é€‚åˆé«˜æ ¡æ•™å­¦ã€å­¦æœ¯ç ”ç©¶ä¸å·¥ä¸šå®è·µï¼ŒåŠ©åŠ›å¿«é€ŸæŒæ¡å¤§æ¨¡å‹å¼€å‘ä¸å®‰å…¨æ”»é˜²æŠ€æœ¯ã€‚
summary.en: This hands-on tutorial series, derived from Shanghai Jiao Tong University courses, offers comprehensive LLMs practical guidance. Covering fine-tuning, prompting, knowledge editing, math reasoning, model watermarking, and jailbreak attacks. Each chapter includes Jupyter notebooks and slides, supporting Huawei Ascend platform. Ideal for academic teaching, research, and industrial practice in LLM development and security.

summary.en: The Google Gemini Computer Use Preview is a browser automation agent powered by the Gemini 2.5 model. It translates natural language instructions into executable browser actions like searching and form filling. The tool leverages Playwright for local browser control and supports cloud deployment via Vertex AI and Browserbase. Accessed through a Python CLI, it demonstrates Gemini's 'computer use' capability, enabling developers to automate web interactions, testing, and intelligent browsing tasks through simple text commands.

summary.en: tududi is a self-hosted task management tool that merges personal simplicity with professional project organization. Its core features include an intelligent recurring task system with multiple patterns and completion-based triggers, seamless Telegram integration, and a hierarchical structure (Areas > Projects > Tasks > Subtasks). Designed for privacy-conscious individuals and teams, it offers 24-language support, OpenAPI documentation, and responsive design for full data control and productivity across devices.

summary.en: OpenCut is a free, open-source alternative to CapCut that provides comprehensive video editing capabilities for web, desktop, and mobile platforms. Built on Next.js and React with Zustand state management, it delivers timeline-based multi-track editing with real-time preview. The project emphasizes privacy by processing videos entirely on-device, eliminating subscriptions and watermarks. Leveraging TypeScript, Bun, and Docker, OpenCut offers a streamlined development experience and a robust, privacy-first substitute for commercial video editing solutions.

summary.en: PDFMathTranslate is a specialized PDF translation tool for scientific documents that preserves original layouts with high fidelity. It accurately handles complex elements including formulas, charts, tables of contents, and annotations. The tool integrates multiple translation backends such as Google, DeepL, Ollama, and OpenAI, offering flexible deployment via CLI, GUI, Docker, and Zotero plugins. Designed for academic research and paper reading, it supports multilingual translation while maintaining the professional quality and readability of scholarly documents.

summary.en: LlamaFactory is a unified framework for efficient fine-tuning of 100+ large language and vision-language models. It offers zero-code CLI and Gradio-powered Web UI, dramatically lowering the barrier to model customization. Published at ACL 2024 and adopted by industry leaders including Amazon, NVIDIA, and Aliyun, it supports both cloud deployment and local training. The framework integrates advanced parameter-efficient techniques like LoRA and QLoRA, making it a widely-used solution for streamlined model adaptation in academic and industrial settings.

Built on Tauri framework with Rust backend and React frontend, it delivers high-performance API debugging experience. Community-funded through license purchases, it offers intuitive interface for developers to organize, test, and manage APIs efficiently.

summary.en: SQLBot is an LLM-powered intelligent data query system leveraging RAG for accurate Text-to-SQL conversion. It enables conversational data analysis (ChatBI) with out-of-the-box deployment, featuring workspace isolation and fine-grained access control. The system continuously improves through custom terminology and SQL examples, offering flexible integration via Web embedding and MCP calls to rapidly empower business applications with natural language query capabilities.

summary.en: The Exa MCP Server is a Model Context Protocol service by Exa Labs that equips AI assistants with advanced web search, code retrieval, and company research capabilities. It seamlessly integrates Exa's intelligent search technology into popular development environments like Cursor, VS Code, and Claude through standardized interfaces. Developers can easily connect via API key to enable AI assistants with real-time web information access and deep content crawling, dramatically enhancing context awareness and data retrieval for intelligent coding assistants.

summary.en: FossFLOW is an open-source Progressive Web App (PWA) for creating beautiful isometric infrastructure and network diagrams. Built with React and the Isoflow library, it runs entirely in-browser with full offline support. The tool offers Docker deployment with persistent storage, a monorepo architecture separating the React component library from the PWA application, and multi-language support. Features include export capabilities, JSON-based diagram storage, and seamless client-side rendering. Perfect for technical documentation, network topology visualization, and infrastructure architecture diagrams.

summary.en: AiNiee is an AI-powered translation tool specialized in complex long-text translation across games, ebooks, documents, and subtitles. It employs chain-of-thought translation, contextual association, and AI glossary to overcome long-text limitations. With deep integration of game extraction tools like Mtool and Renpy, it offers terminology extraction and AI polishing features for efficient, high-quality multilingual translation.

summary.en: A curated collection of comprehensive resources for learning ethical hacking and penetration testing. It covers foundational books, hands-on CTF platforms like Hack The Box and TryHackMe, vulnerable web applications, malware analysis tools, and Linux pentesting distributions. The repository features OSCP-style labs, privilege escalation workshops, and extensive vulnerability databases. Designed for structured skill development from beginner to advanced levels, it serves as an authoritative guide for building practical cybersecurity expertise through real-world scenarios and community-driven contributions.

It curates 30+ cross-domain applications from artistic creation to design workflows. The key contribution is the open-sourced Nano-consistent-150K dataset, which enforces character identity consistency through 35+ editing variations per subject, enabling interleaved data construction for image generation and unified model development.

summary.en: Jdenticon is a lightweight JavaScript library for generating highly recognizable identicon avatars. Supporting both SVG and Canvas rendering, it runs in browsers and Node.js. Using deterministic hash algorithms, identical inputs always produce consistent visual icons, making it perfect for user avatar placeholders. With minimal bundle size, zero dependencies, and official integrations for React, Angular, and other frameworks, it's an ideal solution for user identification systems.

summary.en: This production-ready template integrates Next.js 15 with Cloudflare Workers edge computing, delivering a full-stack solution featuring D1 distributed SQLite database, R2 object storage, Better Auth authentication, and Server Actions. With end-to-end TypeScript via Drizzle ORM, automated CI/CD via GitHub Actions, and preview deployments, it leverages Cloudflare's generous free tier for cost-effective MVP development while scaling seamlessly to enterprise applications.

summary.en: PinMe is a zero-config static frontend deployment tool that publishes sites to decentralized networks with a single command. It eliminates server management, automatically handling availability and persistence while providing verifiable content to prevent tampering. With deep AI workflow integration supporting Claude Code, it offers a frictionless publishing experience for developers and AI agents, compatible with React/Vue/Next.js frameworks.

metadata.name: Termix
metadata.description: Termix is a web-based server management platform with SSH terminal, tunneling, and file editing capabilities.

summary.zh: Termixæ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾å¼€æºè‡ªæ‰˜ç®¡çš„WebæœåŠ¡å™¨ç®¡ç†å¹³å°ï¼Œä¸ºç³»ç»Ÿç®¡ç†å‘˜æä¾›ä¸€ä½“åŒ–è¿ç»´è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½åŒ…æ‹¬ï¼šå…¨åŠŸèƒ½SSHç»ˆç«¯ï¼ˆæ”¯æŒåˆ†å±ä¸æ ‡ç­¾é¡µï¼‰ã€SSHéš§é“ç®¡ç†ï¼ˆè‡ªåŠ¨é‡è¿ä¸å¥åº·ç›‘æµ‹ï¼‰ã€è¿œç¨‹æ–‡ä»¶ç®¡ç†ï¼ˆæ”¯æŒä»£ç /åª’ä½“ç¼–è¾‘ä¸Sudoæƒé™ï¼‰ã€Dockerå®¹å™¨ç®¡æ§åŠæœåŠ¡å™¨ç›‘æ§ï¼ˆCPU/å†…å­˜/ç£ç›˜/é˜²ç«å¢™ï¼‰ã€‚é‡‡ç”¨React+Tailwindæ„å»ºç°ä»£åŒ–å“åº”å¼ç•Œé¢ï¼Œæ”¯æŒRBACæƒé™ä½“ç³»ã€OIDC/2FAè®¤è¯ä¸SQLiteæ•°æ®åº“åŠ å¯†ï¼Œæ˜¯Termiusçš„å¼€æºå…è´¹æ›¿ä»£æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚
summary.en: Termix is an open-source, self-hosted web platform for comprehensive server infrastructure management. It provides a full-featured SSH terminal with split-screen and tab support, automated SSH tunneling with health monitoring, and a remote file manager with sudo privileges. The platform integrates Docker container management, real-time server monitoring (CPU/memory/disk/network/firewall), and RBAC-based team collaboration. Built with React and Tailwind CSS, it features OIDC/2FA authentication, encrypted SQLite storage, and automatic SSL setup, serving as a free, all-in-one alternative to commercial solutions like Termius.

summary.en: Librum is an open-source, cross-platform e-book reader built on Qt framework that merges personal digital library management with cloud synchronization. It offers note-taking, highlighting, AI-powered tools, and deep UI customization, supporting self-hosting for multi-device access. Featuring 70,000+ free books and a modern interface, it delivers a privacy-focused, all-in-one reading solution for users seeking personalized digital literacy experiences.

summary.en: This repository open-sources standardized recipes from Laoxiangji, compiled from their traceability reports to provide replicable home cooking guides. Technical highlights include Docker containerization, AI-generated hand-drawn illustrations, and a web interface. It democratizes Chinese restaurant-standardized cooking methods for home cooks and culinary tech enthusiasts.

summary.en: This project bridges AI Studio chat pages into OpenAI API-compatible interfaces through Tampermonkey scripts and local Python servers. Its core innovation lies in full Function Calling support and dynamic model fetching, enabling complete end-to-end automation. Users can define custom tools that AI automatically triggers based on context, receiving structured responses with parallel invocation and streaming output. The system handles the entire interaction loopâ€”from tool execution to result submissionâ€”providing a standardized API layer that seamlessly integrates with existing development toolchains, libraries, and workflows without modification.

summary.en: Fullstack research agent quickstart template integrating React frontend with LangGraph backend, powered by Gemini 2.5. The agent implements reflective reasoning to dynamically generate search queries, perform web research via Google Search API, identify knowledge gaps, and iteratively refine its approach until producing comprehensive, cited answers. Includes hot-reloading development workflow and CLI example, serving as a production-ready reference for building sophisticated research-augmented conversational AI systems.

summary.en: A hands-on guide repository for fine-tuning Large Language Models with PyTorch and Hugging Face. Covers quantization, Low-Rank Adaptation (LoRA), and dataset formatting templates through practical Colab notebooks. Includes complete workflow from loading quantized models to supervised fine-tuning with SFTTrainer and local deployment. Targets intermediate practitioners, explaining configuration principles and stable concepts essential for adapting to evolving LLM technologies.

summary.en: This repository is a comprehensive collection of machine learning tutorials in Jupyter Notebook format. It covers diverse topics including deep learning, reinforcement learning, time series analysis, and recommendation systems. The key feature is balancing mathematical theory with hands-on implementationâ€”both from scratch using Python's scientific stack (NumPy, SciPy, pandas, PySpark) and with popular frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn, XGBoost, and Hugging Face. It serves as an educational resource for learners seeking deep algorithmic understanding alongside practical engineering skills in model deployment and A/B testing.

metadata.description: AI Powered Knowledge Graph Generator

summary.zh: è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäºå¤§è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹çš„çŸ¥è¯†å›¾è°±è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆç³»ç»Ÿã€‚å®ƒå°†éç»“æ„åŒ–æ–‡æœ¬è§£æä¸º'ä¸»-è°“-å®¾'ä¸‰å…ƒç»„ï¼Œé€šè¿‡å®ä½“æ ‡å‡†åŒ–å’Œå…³ç³»æ¨ç†æ„å»ºç»“æ„åŒ–çŸ¥è¯†ç½‘ç»œï¼Œå¹¶ç”Ÿæˆäº¤äº’å¼å¯è§†åŒ–ã€‚ç³»ç»Ÿæ”¯æŒä»»ä½•OpenAIå…¼å®¹çš„LLM APIï¼ˆå¦‚Ollamaã€vLLMï¼‰ï¼Œæä¾›æ–‡æœ¬åˆ†å—ã€å®ä½“æ¶ˆæ­§ã€å…³ç³»æ¨æ–­ç­‰å®Œæ•´æµæ°´çº¿ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºæ–‡æ¡£çŸ¥è¯†æŒ–æ˜ã€ç ”ç©¶èµ„æ–™æ•´ç†ç­‰åœºæ™¯ã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒä»·å€¼åœ¨äºå°†æµ·é‡æ–‡æœ¬è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºå¯æ¢ç´¢çš„è¯­ä¹‰ç½‘ç»œï¼Œå®ç°çŸ¥è¯†çš„ç›´è§‚å‘ˆç°ä¸æ·±åº¦å…³è”åˆ†æã€‚
summary.en: This is an automated knowledge graph generation system powered by Large Language Models. It processes unstructured text by extracting Subject-Predicate-Object triplets via LLMs, then constructs structured knowledge networks through entity standardization and relationship inference. The system produces interactive visualizations and supports any OpenAI-compatible API endpoints (Ollama, vLLM, cloud services). Key features include text chunking, entity resolution, transitive inference, and configurable pipelines. It transforms textual information into explorable semantic networks, enabling deep knowledge discovery and visual analytics for research and document analysis.

summary.en: A curated repository aggregating premium Telegram resources including bots, groups, channels, and development libraries. Features diverse applications spanning news delivery, community moderation, financial tracking, speech translation, and PDF processing. Provides a comprehensive ecosystem index for both end-users seeking utility services and developers exploring bot development opportunities on the Telegram platform, serving as a central discovery hub.

metadata.name: ClearerVoice-Studio
metadata.description: An AI-Powered Speech Processing Toolkit and Open Source SOTA Pretrained Models, Supporting Speech Enhancement, Separation, and Target Speaker Extraction, etc.

summary.en: ClearerVoice-Studio is an open-source AI-powered speech processing toolkit by Alibaba, featuring SOTA pretrained models for speech enhancement, separation, super-resolution, and target speaker extraction. Supporting 10+ audio formats with stereo processing, it offers flexible NumPy interfaces and comprehensive training/inference scripts. Its FRCRN denoiser has surpassed 3 million uses on ModelScope, delivering a production-ready solution for researchers and developers.

summary.zh: æœ¬ä»“åº“åŸºäºæ–¯å¦ç¦ç¥ç»ç§‘å­¦æ•™æˆAndrew Hubermançš„åŒè¡Œè¯„å®¡ç ”ç©¶ï¼Œæä¾›ä¸€å¥—ç³»ç»ŸåŒ–çš„äººä½“ç³»ç»Ÿä¼˜åŒ–æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒæ˜¯é€šè¿‡è°ƒæ§ç”Ÿç‰©é’Ÿã€é—´æ­‡æ€§ç¦é£Ÿã€ç§‘å­¦è¿åŠ¨å’Œè¥å…»è¡¥å……ç­‰é›¶æˆæœ¬å¹²é¢„æ‰‹æ®µï¼Œåƒè°ƒä¼˜è½¯ä»¶ä¸€æ ·ä¼˜åŒ–ç¡çœ ã€ä»£è°¢å’Œè®¤çŸ¥åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚å†…å®¹æ¶µç›–å…‰ç–—è°ƒèŠ‚æ˜¼å¤œèŠ‚å¾‹ã€ç¦é£Ÿæœºåˆ¶ä¿ƒè¿›ç»†èƒè‡ªå™¬ã€ç²¾å‡†è¿åŠ¨æ—¶æœºé€‰æ‹©ç­‰å®è¯æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ—¨åœ¨å®ç°å¥åº·å¯¿å‘½å»¶é•¿å’Œå·¥ä½œå­¦ä¹ è¡¨ç°æå‡ã€‚
summary.en: This repository presents a systematic human system optimization framework based on peer-reviewed neuroscience research from Stanford Professor Andrew Huberman. It provides evidence-based, zero-cost interventions to optimize sleep, metabolism, and cognitive performance by treating the human body as a tunable system. Key methodologies include circadian rhythm regulation through light exposure, intermittent fasting for cellular autophagy, precision exercise timing, and targeted nutrition. The guide aims to extend healthspan and enhance daily performance through scientifically-validated practices rather than commercialized wellness trends.

metadata.name: llms-txt-hub

summary.en: The largest directory for the emerging llms.txt standard, curating production-ready implementations and developer tools across the ecosystem. It establishes a standardized protocol for how LLMs should access and interpret project documentation, significantly improving AI coding assistant accuracy and developer productivity. The hub provides Chrome extensions, VS Code plugins, Model Context Protocol integration, Raycast extensions, and CLI tools covering major development environments, fostering seamless interoperability between AI models and documentation ecosystems while setting clear boundaries for AI-content interaction.

metadata.description: Pocket Flow: Codebase to Tutorial

summary.zh: è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäº Pocket Flow æ¡†æ¶çš„ AI ä»£ç åº“åˆ†æé¡¹ç›®ï¼Œèƒ½è‡ªåŠ¨çˆ¬å– GitHub ä»“åº“å¹¶æ„å»ºçŸ¥è¯†åº“ï¼Œé€šè¿‡è¯†åˆ«æ ¸å¿ƒæŠ½è±¡å’Œäº¤äº’å…³ç³»ï¼Œå°†å¤æ‚ä»£ç è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºé€‚åˆæ–°æ‰‹çš„å¯è§†åŒ–æ•™ç¨‹ã€‚é¡¹ç›®å·²ç”Ÿæˆ AutoGenã€FastAPIã€LangGraph ç­‰çƒ­é—¨æ¡†æ¶çš„æ•™ç¨‹ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨ Hacker News è·å¾— 900+ èµã€‚æä¾›åœ¨çº¿æœåŠ¡ code2tutorial.comï¼Œç”¨æˆ·åªéœ€ç²˜è´´ GitHub é“¾æ¥å³å¯ç”Ÿæˆæ•™ç¨‹ï¼Œæå¤§é™ä½äº†ä»£ç åº“çš„å­¦ä¹ é—¨æ§›ã€‚
summary.en: This project uses the Pocket Flow LLM framework to automatically crawl GitHub repositories and build knowledge bases. It analyzes entire codebases to identify core abstractions and interactions, transforming complex code into beginner-friendly tutorials with visualizations. The system has generated tutorials for popular frameworks like AutoGen, FastAPI, and LangGraph, reaching Hacker News front page with 900+ upvotes. An online service at code2tutorial.com is now available, allowing users to simply paste a GitHub link to generate tutorials without installation.

metadata.name: beszel
metadata.description: Lightweight server monitoring hub with historical data, docker stats, and alerts.

summary.zh: Beszel æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾åŸºäº PocketBase çš„è½»é‡çº§æœåŠ¡å™¨ç›‘æ§å¹³å°ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨ hub-agent æ¶æ„ã€‚å®ƒæä¾› Docker å®¹å™¨èµ„æºç»Ÿè®¡ã€å†å²æ•°æ®è¿½è¸ªå’Œè‡ªå®šä¹‰å‘Šè­¦åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šç”¨æˆ·ç®¡ç†ã€OAuth è®¤è¯ä¸è‡ªåŠ¨å¤‡ä»½ã€‚ç›¸æ¯”ä¸»æµæ–¹æ¡ˆèµ„æºå ç”¨æ›´ä½ï¼Œå…·å¤‡å‹å¥½ Web ç•Œé¢ï¼Œå¼€ç®±å³ç”¨ï¼Œé€‚åˆä¸ªäººåŠå°å‹å›¢é˜Ÿç›‘æ§ç‰©ç†æœåŠ¡å™¨ã€è™šæ‹Ÿæœºå’Œå®¹å™¨åŒ–ç¯å¢ƒã€‚
summary.en: Beszel is a lightweight server monitoring platform built on PocketBase using a hub-agent architecture. It tracks Docker container metrics, historical data, and configurable alerts while supporting multi-user management, OAuth authentication, and automatic backups. With significantly lower resource consumption than leading solutions and an intuitive web interface, it's ideal for individuals and small teams monitoring physical servers, VMs, and containerized environments.

summary.en: FMHY is a community-driven free resources aggregation platform that indexes vast free content across the internet. Leveraging GitHub collaboration, it offers multi-format access via website, JSON API, and Markdown exports with real-time updates and backups. The project serves as a one-stop discovery hub for developers, researchers, and general users seeking free tools and media. Its open contribution model ensures resource diversity and timeliness, establishing a paradigm of 'open-source directory' in digital resources.

summary.en: Domain Scanner is a high-performance domain availability checker written in Go. It supports dictionary import and pattern generation, verifying domains through DNS, WHOIS, and SSL multi-dimensional checks. Features include ReDoS protection, intelligent concurrency control, and resource estimation to prevent large-scale scan risks. Ideal for domain investors and brand protection, delivering precise results with robust security guarantees and efficient scanning capabilities.

summary.en: An intelligent task management system designed for AI-driven development, deeply integrated with AI coding tools like Cursor. It replaces costly Claude with free Gemini 2.5 Pro for stability and cost-efficiency. Key features include: business knowledge base integration for precise task decomposition, automatic granularity determination, visual web UI management, and bilingual (EN/ZH) support, streamlining AI development workflows for Chinese developers.

summary.en: PowerWhois is a high-performance domain availability scanning tool written in Go, capable of processing millions of domains with exceptional speed. It offers Web and API operation modes, featuring Mix mode for flexible direct/proxy/DNS query scheduling, custom WHOIS/registration API integration, and typo generation. Built on Gofiber backend and Vue3+Quasar2 frontend, it serves domain investors and registrars with Docker deployment.

summary.en: BiliNote is an open-source AI-powered video note-taking tool supporting Bilibili, YouTube, Douyin and more. It leverages Fast-Whisper for local audio transcription and GPT models (OpenAI/DeepSeek/Qwen) to automatically generate structured Markdown notes. Features include auto-screenshots, video timestamp links, customizable summary styles, and local deployment for privacy protection. Ideal for learning, knowledge management, and content creation workflows with GPU acceleration support.

summary.en: Microsoft AI Red Teaming Playground Labs delivers hands-on training for systematically assessing AI system vulnerabilities. Originating from Black Hat USA 2024, this repository provides practical challenges including credential exfiltration, metaprompt extraction, and multi-turn Crescendo attacks. Built on Chat Copilot infrastructure, it integrates PyRIT automation framework to script adversarial testing workflows. The labs cover novel attack vectors beyond traditional security, incorporating adversarial machine learning and Responsible AI failures. Designed for security professionals, it offers a complete skill development path with Jupyter notebooks and Microsoft Learn video tutorials.

It can call multiple backend services through a unified API interface, convert them to the OpenAI format uniformly, and support load balancing. Currently supported backend services include: OpenAI, Anthropic, DeepBricks, OpenRouter, Gemini, Vertex, etc.

summary.en: uni-api unifies LLM APIs into OpenAI format. Supports 4 load balancing types, auto-retry, channel cooling, pure config management, no frontend, ideal for personal deployment.

metadata.name: BotBrowser
metadata.description: Advanced Privacy Browser Core with Unified Fingerprint Defense: Cloudflare, Akamai, Kasada, Shape, DataDome, PerimeterX, hCaptcha, FunCaptcha, Imperva, reCAPTCHA, ThreatMetrix, Adscore

summary.zh: BotBrowseræ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾ä¸“æ³¨äºåæµè§ˆå™¨æŒ‡çº¹è¿½è¸ªçš„éšç§æµè§ˆå™¨æ ¸å¿ƒã€‚åŸºäºæœ€æ–°Chromiumæ„å»ºï¼Œé€šè¿‡ç»Ÿä¸€æŒ‡çº¹é˜²å¾¡æŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œåœ¨Windowsã€macOSã€Linuxç­‰è·¨å¹³å°ç¯å¢ƒä¸‹ä¿æŒå®Œå…¨ä¸€è‡´çš„æŒ‡çº¹ç‰¹å¾ï¼Œæœ‰æ•ˆå¯¹æŠ—Cloudflareã€Akamaiã€Kasadaç­‰31+ç§é«˜çº§è¿½è¸ªæ£€æµ‹æœºåˆ¶ã€‚æ”¯æŒPlaywright/Puppeteeré›†æˆï¼Œæä¾›QUIC/STUNå…¨ä»£ç†ç½‘ç»œæ ˆå’Œæ¯«ç§’çº§ç‹¬ç«‹æŒ‡çº¹åˆ‡æ¢ï¼Œæ€§èƒ½æŸè€—ä½äº1%ã€‚é€‚ç”¨äºéšç§ç ”ç©¶ã€åæ¬ºè¯ˆæµ‹è¯•å’Œè‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–å·¥å…·å¼€å‘ã€‚
summary.en: BotBrowser is a privacy-first browser core engineered to neutralize browser fingerprinting across platforms. Built on the latest Chromium, it maintains identical fingerprint signatures on Windows, macOS, and Linux, defeating over 31 tracking systems including Cloudflare, Akamai, and Kasada. Key features include Playwright/Puppeteer integration with CDP leak blocking, full QUIC/STUN proxy tunneling, per-context fingerprint isolation with millisecond switching, and benchmark-proven performance parity with Chrome. Designed for privacy research and authorized defensive benchmarking.

summary.en: VerbaAurea is an intelligent document preprocessing tool specialized for knowledge base construction, achieving semantic-preserving segmentation through a multi-dimensional scoring system. It supports batch processing of DOCX/PDF formats with original formatting retention, offering both Web UI and CLI modes. Key features include sentence boundary detection, adaptive length control, and differentiated processing strategies for Chinese/English texts, delivering high-quality training data for RAG and LLM fine-tuning.

metadata.name: aipyapp
metadata.description: AI-Powered Python & Python-Powered AI (Python-Use)

summary.zh: Python-Use æå‡ºäº†ä¸€ç§åä¸º 'AI Think Do' çš„ AI Agent 2.0 æ–°èŒƒå¼ï¼Œæ—¨åœ¨å–ä»£ä¾èµ–å¤–éƒ¨æ’ä»¶å’Œå¤æ‚å·¥ä½œæµçš„ä¼ ç»Ÿ Agent 1.0 æ¶æ„ã€‚å…¶æ ¸å¿ƒæ€æƒ³æ˜¯å°†å®Œæ•´çš„ Python è§£é‡Šå™¨ç¯å¢ƒç›´æ¥äº¤ç»™ LLMï¼Œè®©æ¨¡å‹é€šè¿‡è‡ªä¸»ç¼–å†™ã€è°ƒè¯•å’Œæ‰§è¡Œ Python ä»£ç æ¥ç›´æ¥æ“ä½œçœŸå®ç¯å¢ƒï¼ˆå¦‚æ•°æ®ã€æµè§ˆå™¨ã€æ–‡ä»¶ç³»ç»Ÿï¼‰ï¼Œä»è€Œå®ç°ä»»åŠ¡é©±åŠ¨çš„ç«¯åˆ°ç«¯è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–ã€‚è¯¥æ–¹æ¡ˆæ‘’å¼ƒäº† MCPã€Function Calling å’Œæ’ä»¶æ³¨å†Œç­‰ä¸­é—´å±‚ï¼Œå¼ºè°ƒ 'Code is Agent'ï¼Œä»¥æç®€æ¶æ„é‡Šæ”¾ AI çš„åŸç”Ÿæ‰§è¡Œèƒ½åŠ›ã€‚
summary.en: Python-Use introduces a novel AI Agent 2.0 paradigm called 'AI Think Do', designed to replace traditional Agent 1.0 architectures reliant on external plugins and complex workflows. Its core principle is providing LLMs direct access to a full Python interpreter, enabling them to autonomously write, debug, and execute code to interact with real environments (data, browsers, file systems) for task-driven end-to-end automation. It eliminates intermediate layers like MCP, Function Calling, and plugin registration, advocating 'Code is Agent' to unleash native AI execution capabilities with a minimalist architecture.

summary.en: Austen is an AI-powered literary analysis tool that automatically extracts character relationships from books using DeepSeek/OpenAI and visualizes them via Mermaid diagrams. Built on Next.js fullstack with Supabase backend, it enables user management, graph export (SVG/PNG), and social sharingâ€”ideal for educators, readers, and literary research to visually explore narrative dynamics.

summary.en: go-cursor-help is a tool designed to reset the free trial status of Cursor AI IDE, specifically addressing block issues caused by suspicious activity detection, trial request limits, or excessive trial accounts on a single machine. It automates bypassing Cursor's trial verification, enabling developers to continuously access AI programming features. The repository also offers paid Cursor Pro accounts and 7-day passes, providing a complete tool-and-account solution.

summary.en: Deep Research is a privacy-first deep research tool that leverages multiple LLMs (Gemini, OpenAI, Deepseek, etc.) to generate comprehensive reports in approximately 2 minutes. Key features include local browser-side data processing for privacy, integration with search engines like Searxng and Tavily, knowledge graph generation, and local knowledge base management. Built with Next.js, it supports MCP server and SSE API, offering one-click deployment to Vercel or Cloudflare. Ideal for rapid research and knowledge organization with full data control.

summary.en: satnaing/shadcn-admin is a production-grade admin dashboard UI library built with Shadcn UI and Vite. It features 10+ pre-built pages, responsive layouts, light/dark themes, comprehensive RTL support, and deep accessibility optimization. By customizing Shadcn components and integrating TanStack Router, it delivers reusable, enterprise-ready UI solutions that dramatically accelerate backend development.

metadata.name: amlogic-s9xxx-armbian
metadata.description: Supports running Armbian on Amlogic, Allwinner, and Rockchip devices. Support a311d, s922x, s905x3, s905x2, s912, s905d, s905x, s905w, s905, s905l, rk3588, rk3568, rk3399, rk3328, h6, etc.

summary.en: This project ports the Armbian lightweight Linux distribution to TV boxes and ARM single-board computers based on Amlogic, Rockchip, and Allwinner SoCs such as s922x, s905x3, rk3588, and more. It enables users to replace Android TV with a full Debian/Ubuntu-based server operating system, featuring eMMC installation, kernel updates, and SSH remote management capabilities. Ideal for home servers, development platforms, NAS, and media centers, the project provides Docker images and comprehensive documentation to transform consumer devices into powerful, stable Linux machines for various server applications.

summary.zh: Open Wegram Bot æ˜¯åŸºäº Cloudflare Worker/Vercel çš„ Telegram åŒå‘ç§èŠæœºå™¨äººï¼Œå®ç°é›¶æˆæœ¬ã€æ— æœåŠ¡å™¨ã€æ— æ•°æ®åº“çš„æ¶ˆæ¯ä¸­è½¬ã€‚é‡‡ç”¨æ— çŠ¶æ€æ¶æ„ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ GitHub/Vercel ç­‰å¤šå¹³å°ä¸€é”®éƒ¨ç½²ï¼Œæ— éœ€ç»‘å®šåŸŸåå³å¯è¿è¡Œã€‚é€‚ç”¨äºä¸ªäººæ¶ˆæ¯ä»£ç†ã€è½»é‡çº§å®¢æœç­‰åœºæ™¯ï¼Œæä¾›ç¨³å®šå¯é çš„åŒå‘é€šä¿¡èƒ½åŠ›ï¼Œæ˜¯ LivegramBot çš„å…è´¹æ›¿ä»£æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚
summary.en: Open Wegram Bot is a Telegram two-way private messaging bot built on Cloudflare Worker/Vercel, enabling zero-cost, serverless, database-free message forwarding. Featuring stateless architecture, it supports one-click deployment via GitHub/Vercel/Deno/Netlify without custom domain binding. Designed for personal message proxy and lightweight customer service, it provides stable bidirectional communication as a free alternative to LivegramBot with multi-bot support and encrypted security tokens for reliable operation.

metadata.name: easy-dataset
metadata.description: A powerful tool for creating datasets for LLM fine-tuning ã€RAG and Eval

summary.zh: Easy Dataset æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾ä¸“ä¸ºå¤§è¯­è¨€æ¨¡å‹è®­ç»ƒè®¾è®¡çš„æ•°æ®é›†æ„å»ºå·¥å…·ã€‚å®ƒæ”¯æŒ PDFã€Markdownã€DOCX ç­‰æ ¼å¼çš„æ™ºèƒ½è§£æä¸åˆ‡åˆ†ï¼Œå¯è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆé«˜è´¨é‡é—®ç­”å¯¹ã€å¤šè½®å¯¹è¯åŠå›¾åƒé—®ç­”æ•°æ®é›†ã€‚å†…ç½®é¢†åŸŸæ ‡ç­¾æ ‘ã€æ•°æ®æ¸…æ´—å’Œå¢å¼ºåŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºå¾®è°ƒã€RAG å’Œè¯„ä¼°åœºæ™¯ã€‚1.7.0 ç‰ˆæœ¬æ–°å¢è¯„ä¼°ç³»ç»Ÿã€‚
summary.en: Easy Dataset is a specialized tool for building LLM training datasets. It intelligently parses and chunks documents in PDF, Markdown, DOCX, TXT, and EPUB formats, automatically generating high-quality QA pairs, multi-turn dialogues, and visual QA datasets. Features include domain label trees, data cleaning/augmentation, and support for fine-tuning, RAG, and evaluation scenarios. Version 1.7.0 introduces a comprehensive evaluation system with multi-dimensional assessment and human blind testing capabilities for domain-specific model validation, post-fine-tuning evaluation, and RAG recall rate assessment tasks in production environments.

metadata.name: shadowfetch
metadata.description: Shadowfetch is a lightweight fetcher built with native TCP Sockets, for Cloudflare Workers.

summary.zh: Shadowfetch æ˜¯ Cloudflare Workers çš„éšç§ä¼˜å…ˆç½‘ç»œè¯·æ±‚åº“ï¼Œé€šè¿‡åŸç”Ÿ TCP å¥—æ¥å­—ç»•è¿‡å†…ç½® fetch çš„å…ƒæ•°æ®æ³„éœ²é—®é¢˜ã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½åŒ…æ‹¬è‡ªåŠ¨å‰¥ç¦» cf-ipcountryã€cf-connecting-ip ç­‰æ•æ„Ÿå¤´ä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œç¡®ä¿ç”¨æˆ· IP ä¸åœ°ç†ä½ç½®ä¸è¢«æ„å¤–æš´éœ²ã€‚é€‚ç”¨äºéœ€ä¸¥æ ¼éšç§ä¿æŠ¤çš„ä»£ç†ã€é•œåƒæˆ–æ•°æ®è½¬å‘åœºæ™¯ï¼Œæä¾›è½»é‡çº§ã€å¯æ§çš„è¯·æ±‚æ§åˆ¶èƒ½åŠ›ã€‚
summary.en: Shadowfetch is a privacy-focused fetcher for Cloudflare Workers that leverages native TCP sockets to prevent metadata leakage from built-in fetch. It sanitizes sensitive headers like cf-ipcountry and cf-connecting-ip, ensuring user IP and geolocation remain hidden. Ideal for privacy-sensitive proxying, mirroring, and data forwarding with minimal overhead and maximum control.

metadata.name: KAG
metadata.description: KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework based on OpenSPG engine and LLMs.  It is used to build logical reasoning and factual Q&A solutions for professional domain knowledge bases. It can effectively overcome the shortcomings of the traditional RAG vector similarity calculation model.

summary.zh: KAGæ˜¯åŸºäºOpenSPGå¼•æ“ä¸LLMçš„é€»è¾‘å½¢å¼å¼•å¯¼æ¨ç†æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œä¸“ä¸ºä¸“ä¸šé¢†åŸŸçŸ¥è¯†åº“è®¾è®¡ã€‚å®ƒé€šè¿‡çŸ¥è¯†ä¸å—äº’ç´¢å¼•ç»“æ„ã€æ¦‚å¿µè¯­ä¹‰å¯¹é½åŠæ¨¡å¼çº¦æŸçŸ¥è¯†æ„å»ºï¼Œæœ‰æ•ˆè§£å†³ä¼ ç»ŸRAGå‘é‡æ¨¡ç³Šæ€§ä¸GraphRAGå™ªå£°é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šè·³é€»è¾‘æ¨ç†ä¸ç²¾å‡†äº‹å®é—®ç­”ï¼Œæ€§èƒ½æ˜¾è‘—è¶…è¶Šå½“å‰SOTAæ–¹æ³•ã€‚
summary.en: KAG is a logical form-guided reasoning and retrieval framework built on OpenSPG engine and LLMs for professional domain knowledge bases. It overcomes traditional RAG's vector ambiguity and GraphRAG's OpenIE noise via knowledge-chunk mutual indexing, semantic alignment, and schema-constrained knowledge construction. The framework enables multi-hop logical reasoning and precise factual question answering, delivering performance that significantly surpasses current state-of-the-art methods.

metadata.name: DeepSeek-RAG-Chatbot
metadata.description: 100 % FREE, Private (No Internet) DeepSeekâ€™s Advanced RAG: Boost Your RAG Chatbot: Hybrid Retrieval (BM25 + FAISS) + Neural Reranking + HyDeğŸš€

summary.zh: DeepSeek-RAG-Chatbot æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾ 100% å…è´¹ã€å®Œå…¨ç¦»çº¿çš„æ–‡æ¡£æ™ºèƒ½é—®ç­”ç³»ç»Ÿã€‚åŸºäº DeepSeek-7B å¤§æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨ BM25 ä¸ FAISS æ··åˆæ£€ç´¢ã€ç¥ç»é‡æ’åºåŠ HyDE æŸ¥è¯¢æ‰©å±•æŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œæ˜¾è‘—æå‡å¬å›ç‡ä¸å‡†ç¡®ç‡ã€‚v3.0 æ–°å¢ GraphRAG çŸ¥è¯†å›¾è°±æ„å»ºä¸èŠå¤©å†å²è®°å¿†åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå®ç°ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æ„ŸçŸ¥çš„è¿è´¯å¯¹è¯ã€‚æ”¯æŒ PDF/DOCX/TXT æ ¼å¼ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ Streamlit æä¾›ç›´è§‚ UIï¼Œå¯æœ¬åœ°ä¸€é”®éƒ¨ç½²ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºä¼ä¸šæ–‡æ¡£åˆ†æä¸ä¸ªäººçŸ¥è¯†åº“ç®¡ç†ã€‚
summary.en: DeepSeek-RAG-Chatbot is a 100% free, fully offline document QA system powered by DeepSeek-7B. It combines hybrid retrieval (BM25 + FAISS), neural reranking, and HyDE query expansion to maximize recall and accuracy. Version 3.0 introduces GraphRAG knowledge graph construction and chat history memory for contextual, coherent conversations. Supporting PDF/DOCX/TXT formats with an intuitive Streamlit UI, it enables one-click local deployment via Ollama, ideal for enterprise document analysis and personal knowledge management without internet dependency.

metadata.name: openai-gemini

summary.zh: è¯¥é¡¹ç›®æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªOpenAI APIæ ¼å¼çš„ä»£ç†ï¼Œå°†è¯·æ±‚è½¬å‘è‡³Google Gemini APIã€‚åˆ©ç”¨Geminiå…è´¹å±‚çš„æ…·æ…¨é¢åº¦ï¼Œè®©ä»…æ”¯æŒOpenAIæ¥å£çš„å¼€å‘è€…å·¥å…·æ— ç¼åˆ‡æ¢è‡³Geminiæ¨¡å‹ã€‚æ”¯æŒVercelã€Netlifyã€Cloudflare Workersç­‰Serverlesså¹³å°ä¸€é”®éƒ¨ç½²ï¼Œæ— éœ€æœåŠ¡å™¨ç»´æŠ¤ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶æä¾›Nodeã€Denoã€Bunæœ¬åœ°è¿è¡Œæ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œçªç ´åœ°åŸŸé™åˆ¶ã€‚
summary.en: This project provides a serverless proxy that translates OpenAI API requests to Google Gemini API format. By leveraging Gemini's generous free tier, it enables developers to use OpenAI-exclusive tools with Gemini models at zero cost. Supports one-click deployment to Vercel, Netlify, Cloudflare Workers, and Deno Deploy without server maintenance. Offers local development via Node, Deno, or Bun, allowing users outside supported regions to obtain API keys via VPN and access Gemini's powerful models seamlessly.

summary.zh: RKNN-Toolkit2æ˜¯Rockchip NPUçš„å®Œæ•´AIéƒ¨ç½²å·¥å…·é“¾ï¼Œæ”¯æŒæ¨¡å‹è½¬æ¢ã€æ¨ç†ä¸æ€§èƒ½è¯„ä¼°ã€‚æä¾›C/Python APIï¼Œè¦†ç›–RK3588/RV1106ç­‰å¤šæ¬¾èŠ¯ç‰‡ï¼Œå…·å¤‡è‡ªåŠ¨æ··åˆç²¾åº¦ä¸å›¾ä¼˜åŒ–èƒ½åŠ›ï¼ŒåŠ©åŠ›è¾¹ç¼˜AIåº”ç”¨å¿«é€Ÿè½åœ°ã€‚åŒ…å«Toolkitã€RuntimeåŠLiteç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œæ”¯æŒPython 3.6-3.12ï¼Œæ˜¯åµŒå…¥å¼AIå¼€å‘çš„æ ¸å¿ƒåŸºç¡€è®¾æ–½ï¼Œä¸å…¼å®¹æ—§ç‰ˆRKNN-Toolkitã€‚
summary.en: RKNN-Toolkit2 is a complete AI deployment toolchain for Rockchip NPU platforms, enabling model conversion, inference and performance evaluation. It provides both C and Python APIs, supporting multiple chips including RK3588 and RV1106 series. Key features include automatic mixed precision, enhanced graph optimization, and compatibility with Python 3.6-3.12. The toolkit accelerates edge AI application development on embedded devices and is not compatible with the legacy RKNN-Toolkit, requiring migration for new projects.

metadata.name: chatbot
metadata.description: A full-featured, hackable Next.js AI chatbot built by Vercel

summary.zh: Vercelå¼€æºçš„å…¨åŠŸèƒ½AIèŠå¤©æœºå™¨äººæ¨¡æ¿ï¼ŒåŸºäºNext.js 14 App Routerä¸React Server Componentsæ„å»ºã€‚é›†æˆVercel AI SDKæä¾›ç»Ÿä¸€LLM APIï¼Œé»˜è®¤æ”¯æŒxAIï¼Œå¯æ— ç¼åˆ‡æ¢OpenAIç­‰æä¾›å•†ã€‚é‡‡ç”¨shadcn/uiç»„ä»¶ä¸Tailwind CSSæ ·å¼ï¼Œæ•°æ®æŒä¹…åŒ–ä¾æ‰˜Neon Serverless Postgreså’ŒVercel Blobå­˜å‚¨ï¼Œå†…ç½®Auth.jsè®¤è¯ã€‚æ”¯æŒä¸€é”®éƒ¨ç½²è‡³Vercelï¼Œä¸ºå¼€å‘è€…æä¾›å¼€ç®±å³ç”¨çš„å¯æ‰©å±•èŠå¤©åº”ç”¨è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚
summary.en: Vercel's open-source, full-featured AI chatbot template built with Next.js 14 App Router and React Server Components. Powered by Vercel AI SDK for unified LLM API access, defaulting to xAI while supporting seamless integration with OpenAI, Anthropic, and other providers. Features shadcn/ui components styled with Tailwind CSS, data persistence via Neon Serverless Postgres and Vercel Blob storage, and Auth.js authentication. Enables developers to quickly build and deploy hackable chatbot applications with one-click Vercel deployment.

summary.en: Pocker is a full-stack Docker registry management system built with Next.js, designed to solve slow Docker Hub pulls in China. It automatically transfers images to Huawei Cloud SWR via GitHub Actions, enabling one-click Vercel deployment. Key features include multi-region node switching (23 global nodes), complete lifecycle management of images/tags/namespaces, usage statistics, dark mode, and automated workflows. It empowers individuals and teams to own private Docker registries with full data control and security.

summary.en: MoePush is an open-source, adorable message push service built on Next.js and Cloudflare stack, supporting over 10 channels including DingTalk, WeCom, Telegram, and more. Leveraging edge computing architecture with Cloudflare Pages and D1 database, it enables zero-cost deployment and batch push via group interfaces. The UI, crafted with shadcn/ui, combines aesthetics with usability. Ideal for monitoring alerts and automated notifications, it offers a developer-friendly solution with GitHub OAuth integration and seamless deployment.

metadata.name: kotaemon
metadata.description: An open-source RAG-based tool for chatting with your documents.

summary.zh: kotaemon æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾å¼€æºçš„ RAGï¼ˆæ£€ç´¢å¢å¼ºç”Ÿæˆï¼‰æ–‡æ¡£å¯¹è¯å·¥å…·ï¼Œæä¾›ç®€æ´æ˜“ç”¨çš„ Web UIã€‚æ”¯æŒ OpenAIã€Azureã€Cohere ç­‰äº‘ç«¯ LLM API åŠ Ollamaã€llama-cpp æœ¬åœ°æ¨¡å‹ï¼ŒåŸºäº Gradio æ„å»ºå¯é«˜åº¦å®šåˆ¶çš„ç•Œé¢ã€‚æ—¢é€‚åˆéæŠ€æœ¯ç”¨æˆ·å¿«é€Ÿæ­å»ºæ–‡æ¡£é—®ç­”ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œä¹Ÿä¸ºå¼€å‘è€…æä¾›çµæ´»çš„ RAG ç®¡é“æ¡†æ¶ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ Docker éƒ¨ç½²å’Œ Colab ä¸€é”®è¿è¡Œã€‚
summary.en: Kotaemon is an open-source RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) document chat tool that provides a clean, minimalistic, and highly customizable Gradio UI. It supports diverse LLM backendsâ€”both cloud APIs (OpenAI, Azure OpenAI, Cohere) and local models (Ollama, llama-cpp-python). Designed for dual audiences, it enables non-technical users to deploy document QA systems effortlessly via Docker or Colab, while offering developers a modular framework to build, extend, and fine-tune RAG pipelines with minimal coding effort.

metadata.name: deepseek2api
metadata.description: DeepSeek é€†å‘ API

summary.zh: DeepSeek2APIé€šè¿‡é€†å‘å·¥ç¨‹å°†DeepSeekæ¨¡å‹å°è£…ä¸ºOpenAIå…¼å®¹æ¥å£ï¼Œæ”¯æŒdeepseek-chatã€deepseek-reasonerç­‰æ¨¡å‹ã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒç‰¹æ€§åŒ…æ‹¬é«˜é€Ÿæµå¼è¾“å‡ºã€å¤šè½®å¯¹è¯ã€R1æ·±åº¦æ€è€ƒåŠå¤šè´¦å·è½®æ¢æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œæœ‰æ•ˆåˆ†æ•£å•è´¦å·é£é™©ã€‚æä¾›Dockerã€VercelåŠåŸç”Ÿéƒ¨ç½²æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œé…ç½®çµæ´»ã€‚é¡¹ç›®æ˜ç¡®å£°æ˜ä»…é™ç ”ç©¶å­¦ä¹ ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œç¦æ­¢å•†ç”¨ï¼Œè§„é¿å®˜æ–¹æœåŠ¡å‹åŠ›ä¸å°å·é£é™©ã€‚
summary.en: DeepSeek2API wraps DeepSeek models into OpenAI-compatible interfaces via reverse engineering, supporting deepseek-chat, deepseek-reasoner and search variants. Key features include high-speed streaming output, multi-turn conversation, R1 deep reasoning, and multi-account rotation to mitigate single-account limitations. Offers flexible deployment via Docker, Vercel, or native Python. Project explicitly for research/learning only, prohibiting commercial use to avoid official service pressure and account bans.

metadata.name: AI-reads-books-page-by-page
metadata.description: AI reads books: Page-by-Page PDF Knowledge Extractor & Summarizer. script performs an intelligent page-by-page analysis of PDF books, methodically extracting knowledge points and generating progressive summaries at specified intervals

summary.en: This tool performs AI-powered page-by-page analysis of PDF books, automatically extracting key knowledge points and generating progressive summaries at configurable intervals. Featuring intelligent filtering of TOC/index pages, resume capability, and structured Markdown output, it maintains contextual flow while processing. Ideal for deep learning, research material processing, and knowledge base construction, it efficiently transforms massive books into structured knowledge, significantly improving reading efficiency and knowledge internalization through systematic analysis.

summary.en: The Public Suffix List (PSL) is a critical internet infrastructure component that defines all publicly registrable domain suffixes, such as .com, .co.uk, and .pvt.k12.ma.us. It enables browsers and network libraries to implement secure cookie scoping, preventing cross-site request forgery and other security vulnerabilities. This volunteer-maintained project provides the definitive bridge between ICANN's domain name system and real-world developer needs through strict validation guidelines and community-driven updates, ensuring universal acceptance across the web ecosystem while maintaining meticulous accuracy through a rigorous PR review process.

summary.en: DenoProxy is a lightweight dynamic proxy service built on Deno runtime, featuring real-time target configuration via URL parameters and seamless request forwarding for /proxy paths. Leveraging Deno's native HTTP server and KV storage, it supports both local execution and Deno Deploy cloud deployment. Ideal for API debugging, cross-origin request proxying, and development environment network tunneling, it delivers flexible configuration and minimal deployment overhead.

summary.en: spoo.me is an open-source, API-first URL shortening infrastructure offering advanced features like custom slugs (including emojis), password protection, and click limits. Its core strength lies in comprehensive analytics covering geographic distribution, device breakdown, traffic patterns, referrer tracking, and bot detection, with multi-format data export (CSV/JSON/XLSX/XML). Requiring no registration, it provides completely free unlimited usage with self-hosting capability. Ideal for developers and enterprises needing private deployment or integrated link management with detailed click insights.

metadata.name: deep-research-web-ui
metadata.description: (Supports DeepSeek R1) An AI-powered research assistant that performs iterative, deep research on any topic by combining search engines, web scraping, and large language models.

summary.zh: åŸºäºæ·±åº¦ç ”ç©¶çš„AIåŠ©æ‰‹ï¼Œé€šè¿‡è¿­ä»£æœç´¢ä¸LLMå®ç°è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–ä¿¡æ¯æŒ–æ˜ã€‚æ”¯æŒDeepSeek R1ç­‰ä¸»æµæ¨¡å‹ï¼Œæä¾›æ ‘çŠ¶å¯è§†åŒ–ç ”ç©¶æµç¨‹ä¸å®æ—¶æµå¼åé¦ˆã€‚é‡‡ç”¨æµè§ˆå™¨æœ¬åœ°åŒ–å¤„ç†ç¡®ä¿æ•°æ®å®‰å…¨ï¼Œé›†æˆTavily/Firecrawlå¤šæºæœç´¢ã€‚æ”¯æŒPDFå¯¼å‡ºä¸Dockeréƒ¨ç½²ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºå­¦æœ¯ç ”ç©¶ã€å¸‚åœºåˆ†æç­‰æ·±åº¦è°ƒç ”åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: An AI-powered research assistant that automates deep information gathering through iterative search and LLM reasoning. Features real-time streaming feedback and tree-structured visualization of research processes. Supports DeepSeek R1 and major LLM providers with local browser processing for data privacy. Integrates Tavily and Firecrawl for web search, offers PDF export, Docker deployment, and server mode. Ideal for academic research, market analysis, and competitive intelligence requiring comprehensive, automated investigation with full citation tracking.

metadata.name: rag-web-ui
metadata.description: RAG Web UI is an intelligent dialogue system based on RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) technology.

summary.zh: RAG Web UIæ˜¯åŸºäºRAGæŠ€æœ¯çš„æ™ºèƒ½å¯¹è¯ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œç”¨äºæ„å»ºç§æœ‰åŒ–çŸ¥è¯†åº“é—®ç­”æœåŠ¡ã€‚æ”¯æŒPDFã€DOCXã€Markdownç­‰æ–‡æ¡£çš„è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ†å—ä¸å‘é‡åŒ–ï¼Œå…¼å®¹OpenAIã€DeepSeekåŠOllamaæœ¬åœ°æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œå¯åˆ‡æ¢ChromaDB/Qdrantå‘é‡æ•°æ®åº“ã€‚å…·å¤‡å¤šè½®å¯¹è¯ã€å¼•ç”¨æº¯æºã€å¼‚æ­¥å¤„ç†åŠOpenAPIæ¥å£ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºä¼ä¸šçŸ¥è¯†åº“ä¸æ™ºèƒ½å®¢æœåœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: RAG Web UI is an intelligent dialogue system based on Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) technology for building private knowledge base Q&A services. It offers comprehensive document management supporting PDF, DOCX, Markdown formats with automatic chunking and vectorization. The system features a frontend-backend separated architecture, flexible LLM support (OpenAI, DeepSeek, Ollama), and interchangeable vector databases (ChromaDB, Qdrant) via Factory pattern. Production-ready capabilities include multi-turn dialogue, citation tracking, async processing, and OpenAPI interfaces, suitable for enterprise knowledge bases and intelligent customer service applications.

summary.en: jdapi is an unofficial Python wrapper for JD.com APIs, enabling automated account operations with minimal code. It simplifies common scenarios like check-ins, coupon claiming, and order queries by abstracting HTTP complexities into Python functions. Key features include automated cookie management, request encryption, and anti-anti-crawling mechanisms, ideal for building JD ecosystem automation scripts and lightweight integrations.

metadata.name: new-api
metadata.description: A unified AI model hub for aggregation & distribution. It supports cross-converting various LLMs into OpenAI-compatible, Claude-compatible, or Gemini-compatible formats. A centralized gateway for personal and enterprise model management. ğŸ¥

summary.en: New API is a next-generation LLM gateway and AI asset management system that unifies diverse large language models through protocol conversion layers into OpenAI, Claude, and Gemini-compatible interfaces. It provides centralized model routing, load balancing, and distribution management for both personal and enterprise deployments. Built with Go for high performance, the system acts as a standardized access plane for cross-model ecosystems, enabling seamless integration, governance, and observability of heterogeneous AI assets while maintaining strict API compatibility and enterprise-grade security.
