summary.en: This book systematically presents the comprehensive technical framework of Large Language Models, covering fundamental aspects including pre-training, fine-tuning, alignment, and prompt engineering. Based on the authors' pioneering research and practical industrial experience in developing models like Wenlan and Yulan, it offers a structured learning roadmap with supplementary lecture slides. Aimed at readers with foundational deep learning knowledge, this authoritative volume serves as an essential reference for both academic courses and industrial R&D in LLM technology, bridging theoretical concepts with real-world implementation.

summary.en: v2rayA is a cross-platform proxy client based on V2Ray core with an intuitive Web GUI. It supports major protocols including VMess, VLESS, SS, SSR, Trojan, Tuic and Juicity, offering global transparent proxy on Linux and system proxy on Windows/macOS. Deployable via Docker, routers, NAS and multiple package managers, it stores all user data locally, ideal for secure and convenient network access.

metadata.name: OmniThink
metadata.description: [EMNLP 2025]  OmniThink: Expanding Knowledge Boundaries in Machine Writing through Thinking

summary.zh: OmniThink æ˜¯ EMNLP 2025 æå‡ºçš„æœºå™¨å†™ä½œæ¡†æ¶ï¼Œé€šè¿‡æ¨¡æ‹Ÿäººç±»è®¤çŸ¥çš„è¿­ä»£æ‰©å±•ä¸åæ€æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œçªç ´çŸ¥è¯†è¾¹ç•Œç”Ÿæˆé«˜è´¨é‡é•¿ç¯‡æ–‡ç« ã€‚é›†æˆ RAGFlow å®ç°ç¦»çº¿æœ¬åœ°æœç´¢ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ DeepSeek-Reasoner ç­‰æ¨ç†æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºå­¦æœ¯ç»¼è¿°ã€æŠ¥å‘Šæ’°å†™ç­‰çŸ¥è¯†å¯†é›†å‹å†™ä½œåœºæ™¯ï¼Œæ˜¾è‘—æå‡å†…å®¹æ·±åº¦ä¸çŸ¥è¯†å¯†åº¦ã€‚
summary.en: OmniThink is an EMNLP 2025 machine writing framework that simulates human cognitive processes through iterative expansion and reflection to generate high-quality long-form articles. It integrates RAGFlow for offline local search, supports DeepSeek-Reasoner models, and is designed for knowledge-intensive writing applications like academic reviews and reports, enhancing content depth and knowledge density.

metadata.name: fates-app
metadata.description: A modern personal time management and task tracking application

summary.zh: Fates æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾åŸºäº Tauri å’Œ Svelte æ„å»ºçš„å¼€æºæ—¶é—´ç®¡ç†ä¸ä»»åŠ¡è¿½è¸ªåº”ç”¨ã€‚å®ƒé€šè¿‡å¯è§†åŒ–æ—¶é—´è½´ã€çƒ­åŠ›å›¾å’Œæ•°æ®åˆ†æå¸®åŠ©ç”¨æˆ·è¯†åˆ«æ—¶é—´é»‘æ´ï¼Œå†…ç½® AI åŠ©æ‰‹å¯ä¼˜åŒ–ä»»åŠ¡æè¿°å¹¶è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆå‘¨æŠ¥ã€‚é‡‡ç”¨æœ¬åœ°ä¼˜å…ˆå­˜å‚¨ç­–ç•¥ä¿éšœéšç§ï¼Œæ”¯æŒå¤šç«¯åŒæ­¥ï¼Œæ—¨åœ¨è§£å†³èŒåœºäººå£«æ—¶é—´ç®¡ç†æ··ä¹±ã€å·¥ä½œæ•ˆç‡ä½ä¸‹åŠå‘¨æŠ¥æ€»ç»“å›°éš¾ç­‰ç—›ç‚¹ã€‚
summary.en: Fates is a modern open-source time management and task tracking application built with Tauri and Svelte, designed to help professionals combat productivity challenges. It features visual timeline views, GitHub-style calendar heatmaps, and comprehensive data analytics to reveal time consumption patterns. The integrated AI assistant optimizes task descriptions, auto-generates weekly reports, and provides intelligent scheduling suggestions. Employing a local-first storage architecture for privacy protection, it supports seamless synchronization across web and desktop platforms. Fates directly addresses common pain points: disorganized time management, inefficient workflows, and the tedious process of weekly reporting, making it an ideal tool for self-improvement and career development.

metadata.name: Gemini-Search
metadata.description: Perplexity style AI Search engine clone built with Gemini 2.0 Flash and Grounding

summary.zh: åŸºäº Gemini 2.0 Flash çš„ AI æœç´¢å¼•æ“ï¼Œæä¾› Perplexity å¼å®æ—¶é—®ç­”ä½“éªŒã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒäº®ç‚¹åœ¨äº Google Search Grounding æŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œç¡®ä¿ç­”æ¡ˆé™„å¸¦å¯æº¯æºçš„å¼•ç”¨æ¥æºã€‚å…¨æ ˆ TypeScript æ¶æ„ï¼ˆReact + Expressï¼‰å®ç°é«˜æ•ˆå¼€å‘ï¼Œæ”¯æŒä¼šè¯å†…è¿½é—®ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºç ”ç©¶ã€å­¦ä¹ ä¸ç²¾å‡†ä¿¡æ¯æ£€ç´¢åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: Gemini-Search is a production-ready AI search engine clone that replicates Perplexity's core functionality using Google's cutting-edge Gemini 2.0 Flash model. Its key technical innovation lies in the Search Grounding integration, which fetches real-time web results and automatically generates citations for every answer. The full-stack TypeScript implementation combines React with Vite on the frontend and Express.js on the backend, delivering a responsive, modern interface with conversational memory. Designed for researchers, students, and professionals seeking accurate, traceable information with minimal latency.

metadata.name: WTF-zk
metadata.description: é›¶çŸ¥è¯†è¯æ˜å…¥é—¨æ•™ç¨‹ã€‚Comprehensive Zero-Knowledge Proofs Tutorial. #zk #WIP

summary.zh: WTF-zk ä¸ºé›¶çŸ¥è¯†è¯æ˜å…¥é—¨æ•™ç¨‹ï¼Œé¢å‘é«˜ä¸­æ•°å­¦åŸºç¡€å­¦ä¹ è€…ã€‚é¡¹ç›®ä»¥ Python å®ç°æ ¸å¿ƒç®—æ³•ï¼Œç³»ç»Ÿæ¶µç›–æ•°è®ºã€æŠ½è±¡ä»£æ•°ã€æ¤­åœ†æ›²çº¿ç­‰æ•°å­¦åŸºç¡€ï¼Œå¹¶é€æ­¥æ·±å…¥ ZK è¯æ˜ç†è®ºã€‚é€šè¿‡ Jupyter Notebook äº¤äº’å¼æ•™å­¦ï¼Œç»“åˆç»å…¸å¯†ç å­¦æ–¹æ¡ˆå¤ç°ï¼Œä¸ºé›¶çŸ¥è¯†è¯æ˜é¢†åŸŸæä¾›ä½é—¨æ§›ã€ç†è®ºä¸å®è·µç»“åˆçš„å­¦ä¹ è·¯å¾„ã€‚
summary.en: WTF-zk is a comprehensive Zero-Knowledge Proofs tutorial designed for learners with only high school mathematics background. The project uses Python to implement core cryptographic algorithms, systematically covering essential mathematical foundations including number theory, abstract algebra, ring fields, and elliptic curves. Through interactive Jupyter Notebook demonstrations and step-by-step reproduction of classic schemes like RSA and Diffie-Hellman, it creates an accessible, theory-practice integrated learning pathway into the ZK proofs domain.

metadata.name: electerm
metadata.description: ğŸ“»Terminal/ssh/sftp/ftp/telnet/serialport/RDP/VNC/Spice client(linux, mac, win)

summary.zh: electerm æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾å¼€æºçš„è·¨å¹³å°ç»ˆç«¯ä¸è¿œç¨‹è¿æ¥å®¢æˆ·ç«¯ï¼Œé›†æˆ SSH/SFTP/FTP/Telnet/ä¸²å£/RDP/VNC ç­‰å¤šç§åè®®ã€‚æ”¯æŒ Windowsã€macOSã€Linuxï¼ˆå« ARM64ï¼‰ï¼Œæä¾›å…¨å±€çƒ­é”®ã€é€æ˜çª—å£ã€èƒŒæ™¯å›¾ç‰‡ç­‰ç‰¹æ€§ã€‚å†…ç½® AI åŠ©æ‰‹ï¼ˆDeepSeek/OpenAIï¼‰ä¸ MCP åè®®æ”¯æŒï¼Œå®ç°å‘½ä»¤å»ºè®®ä¸å·¥å…·é›†æˆã€‚é€šè¿‡ Zmodem/Trzsz å®ç°æ–‡ä»¶ä¼ è¾“ï¼Œå¹¶å¯å°†é…ç½®åŒæ­¥è‡³ GitHub/Gitee Gistï¼Œæ˜¯å¼€å‘è€…ç®¡ç†è¿œç¨‹æœåŠ¡å™¨çš„å…¨èƒ½å·¥å…·ã€‚
summary.en: electerm is an open-source, cross-platform terminal and remote connection client that consolidates SSH, SFTP, FTP, Telnet, serial port, RDP, VNC, and Spice protocols into a single application. Built on Electron, it supports Windows, macOS, and Linux (including ARM64 architectures). Key features include global hotkeys for instant access, transparent windows, terminal background images, and integrated AI assistants (DeepSeek, OpenAI) via MCP protocol for command suggestions and script generation. It facilitates file transfers through Zmodem and Trzsz, supports SSH tunneling and proxy configurations, and allows synchronization of bookmarks and settings to GitHub/Gitee Gist, making it a versatile tool for developers and system administrators managing remote infrastructure.

metadata.name: readest
metadata.description: Readest is a modern, feature-rich ebook reader designed for avid readers offering seamless cross-platform access, powerful tools, and an intuitive interface to elevate your reading experience.

summary.zh: Readest æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾åŸºäº Next.js 16 å’Œ Tauri v2 æ„å»ºçš„å¼€æºç”µå­ä¹¦é˜…è¯»å™¨ï¼Œè¦†ç›–æ¡Œé¢ã€ç§»åŠ¨åŠ Web å…¨å¹³å°ã€‚æ”¯æŒ EPUB/MOBI/AZW3 ç­‰ä¸»æµæ ¼å¼ï¼Œæä¾›åˆ†å±å¹¶è¡Œé˜…è¯»ã€ä»£ç è¯­æ³•é«˜äº®ã€å…¨æ–‡æ£€ç´¢ä¸æ™ºèƒ½ç¬”è®°ç­‰æ·±åº¦åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œä¸“ä¸ºè¿½æ±‚æ²‰æµ¸å¼ä½“éªŒçš„æ·±åº¦é˜…è¯»è€…æ‰“é€ ã€‚
summary.en: Readest is a modern, open-source ebook reader engineered for immersive reading experiences. Leveraging Next.js 16 and Tauri v2, it delivers native performance across macOS, Windows, Linux, Android, iOS, and web platforms. Supporting EPUB, MOBI, AZW3, FB2, CBZ, TXT, and experimental PDF formats, it features split-screen parallel reading, code syntax highlighting, full-text search, dictionary lookup, and comprehensive annotation tools. Built as a sophisticated rewrite of Foliate, Readest combines powerful library management with customizable reading settings to serve avid readers and technical professionals.

summary.en: The Public APIs repository is a community-curated directory offering free RESTful APIs across diverse domains including finance, weather, geolocation, and telecommunications. Manually reviewed for quality, this collection serves as a valuable resource for developers seeking reliable third-party services without cost. It streamlines API discovery for rapid prototyping and product development, featuring categories like stock market data, IP geolocation, weather information, and phone validation. The project is maintained by both community contributors and APILayer, ensuring ongoing updates and a well-organized structure.

summary.en: This project aggregates GeekTime's premium course documentation, offering offline Markdown and PDF resources. Its core value lies in building a full-text searchable technical knowledge base, featuring Docker deployment for image loading fixes, and responsive design for PC/mobile browsers. Powered by MkDocs-Material, it provides an elegant reading experience for developers' offline learning and knowledge management.

metadata.description: User-friendly AI Interface (Supports Ollama, OpenAI API, ...)

summary.en: Open WebUI is a comprehensive self-hosted AI platform that seamlessly integrates Ollama and OpenAI-compatible APIs with full offline deployment capability. Featuring a built-in RAG inference engine and native Python function calling tools, it offers granular user permissions, responsive design, and PWA mobile support. The platform enables voice/video calls, Markdown/LaTeX rendering, and extensible plugin architecture. Deployable via Docker/Kubernetes, it serves as an enterprise-grade solution for private LLM orchestration and AI application development requiring air-gapped security.

summary.zh: Pake æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾åŸºäº Rust Tauri çš„è½»é‡çº§æ¡Œé¢åº”ç”¨æ‰“åŒ…å·¥å…·ï¼Œå¯å°†ä»»æ„ç½‘é¡µè½¬åŒ–ä¸ºç‹¬ç«‹åŸç”Ÿåº”ç”¨ã€‚ç›¸æ¯” Electron åº”ç”¨ä½“ç§¯ç¼©å°çº¦ 20 å€ï¼Œä»… 5MB å·¦å³ï¼Œå†…å­˜å ç”¨æ›´ä½ä¸”è¿è¡Œæ›´å¿«ã€‚æ”¯æŒ macOSã€Windows å’Œ Linux ä¸‰å¤§å¹³å°ï¼Œæä¾› CLI å‘½ä»¤è¡Œä¸€é”®æ‰“åŒ…å’Œåœ¨çº¿æ„å»ºæœåŠ¡ã€‚å†…ç½®å¿«æ·é”®ã€æ²‰æµ¸å¼çª—å£ã€æ ·å¼å®šåˆ¶ã€å¹¿å‘Šè¿‡æ»¤ç­‰åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œå·²é¢„æ‰“åŒ…å¾®ä¿¡è¯»ä¹¦ã€Twitterã€Grokã€DeepSeek ç­‰å¸¸ç”¨åº”ç”¨ã€‚
summary.en: Pake is a lightweight desktop app packaging tool built with Rust Tauri that converts any webpage into a native standalone application. It reduces package size by approximately 20x compared to Electron (around 5MB), with faster performance and lower memory usage. Supporting macOS, Windows, and Linux, it offers one-command packaging via CLI and online building. Features include keyboard shortcuts, immersive windows, style customization, and ad removal. Pre-built packages are available for popular services like WeRead, Twitter, Grok, and DeepSeek.

summary.en: This repository offers an automated solution for Cursor Pro account registration and renewal, enabling free access to premium features through simulated user interactions. It serves developers seeking continuous use of AI code editor advanced capabilities. Technical implementation includes automation scripting, protocol reverse engineering, and anti-detection mechanisms. Released under CC BY-NC-ND 4.0 non-commercial license, users assume all compliance risks.

summary.en: my-geektime is a self-hosted GeekTime VIP course platform specializing in audio/video resource management. It enables permanent offline viewing through one-time caching, one-click online documentation publishing, and local media downloads. Built with Docker containerization for cross-platform deployment (amd64/arm64), it transforms streaming content into private learning assets. This tool eliminates dependency on official servers, providing lifelong access to purchased courses while maintaining content organization, search capabilities, and seamless playback functionality for individual learners.

summary.en: Escrcpy is a cross-platform Android device management tool built on scrcpy. It provides an intuitive Electron-based GUI for mirroring and controlling Android devices with low latency. Key features include multi-device orchestration, natural language control via AutoGLM AI, automated workflow execution, and wireless connectivity with Gnirehtet reverse tethering. Ideal for mobile development, testing, and batch device operations.

metadata.name: storm
metadata.description: An LLM-powered knowledge curation system that researches a topic and generates a full-length report with citations.

summary.zh: STORMæ˜¯æ–¯å¦ç¦å¼€å‘çš„LLMé©±åŠ¨çŸ¥è¯†æ•´ç†ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œé€šè¿‡ä¸¤é˜¶æ®µæµç¨‹è‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆå¸¦å¼•ç”¨çš„ç»´åŸºç™¾ç§‘å¼é•¿æ–‡ã€‚å…¶æ ¸å¿ƒæŠ€æœ¯æ˜¯å¤šè§†è§’æé—®æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œå¼•å¯¼LLMæå‡ºæ·±åº¦ç ”ç©¶é—®é¢˜ï¼Œç»“åˆäº’è”ç½‘æ£€ç´¢ä¸å‘é‡æœç´¢æ„å»ºçŸ¥è¯†å¤§çº²ï¼Œå†ç”Ÿæˆå®Œæ•´æŠ¥å‘Šã€‚Co-STORMæ‰©å±•æ”¯æŒäººæœºåä½œï¼Œå·²æœåŠ¡è¶…7ä¸‡ç”¨æˆ·ï¼Œæ”¯æŒGPT-4oç­‰æ¨¡å‹åŠBing/You.comæ£€ç´¢ï¼Œæä¾›PythonåŒ…ä¸Streamlitç•Œé¢ã€‚
summary.en: STORM is a Stanford-developed LLM-powered knowledge curation system that automatically generates full-length, cited Wikipedia-style articles through a two-stage pipeline. Its core innovation is perspective-guided question asking that enables deep research, combined with internet retrieval and vector search to build topic outlines before article generation. The enhanced Co-STORM supports human-AI collaboration. Serving over 70,000 users, it integrates GPT-4o, Bing/You.com search, and offers a Python package with Streamlit UI for research assistance and knowledge exploration.

summary.en: This community-driven project provides interactive visual roadmaps for developers to navigate career growth across 20+ technical domains including frontend, backend, DevOps, AI engineering, and data science. Featuring clickable node-based learning paths, it delivers structured skill development guidance, best practices, and interview preparation resources. Built with modern web technologies and responsive design, it has become a globally recognized reference for systematic technical upskilling and career planning.

summary.en: Lightweight (25MB) cross-platform Markdown note app with AI, RAG and MCP support for intelligent knowledge organization.

metadata.name: maxun

summary.zh: Maxun æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾å¼€æºæ— ä»£ç ç½‘é¡µæ•°æ®å¹³å°ï¼Œå¯å°†ä»»æ„ç½‘ç«™è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºç»“æ„åŒ– APIã€‚å®ƒæä¾›å››å¤§æœºå™¨äººç±»å‹ï¼šExtractï¼ˆæ”¯æŒå½•åˆ¶å’Œ AI è‡ªç„¶è¯­è¨€æå–ï¼‰ã€Scrapeï¼ˆæ•´é¡µè½¬ Markdown/HTMLï¼‰ã€Crawlï¼ˆå…¨ç«™çˆ¬å–ï¼‰å’Œ Searchï¼ˆè‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–æœç´¢ï¼‰ã€‚å¹³å°é€šè¿‡æ¨¡æ‹ŸçœŸå®ç”¨æˆ·è¡Œä¸ºï¼Œå®ç°ä»ç®€å•åˆ°å¤æ‚çš„è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–æ•°æ®é‡‡é›†ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äº AI å·¥ä½œæµã€ç«å“ç›‘æ§å’Œå•†ä¸šæ™ºèƒ½ç­‰åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: Maxun is an open-source no-code web data platform that transforms any website into structured APIs. It offers four robot types: Extract (with Recorder and AI natural language modes), Scrape (full-page to Markdown/HTML), Crawl (entire site crawling), and Search (automated web searches). By emulating real user behavior, it enables automated data collection workflows for AI pipelines, competitive intelligence, and business analytics.

metadata.name: Shiro
metadata.description: ğŸ“œ A minimalist personal website embodying the purity of paper and freshness of snow.

summary.zh: Shiro æ˜¯ä¸º Mix Space ç”Ÿæ€ç³»ç»Ÿæ‰“é€ çš„æç®€ä¸»ä¹‰ä¸ªäººç½‘ç«™ä¸»é¢˜ï¼Œèåˆçº¸çš„çº¯å‡€ä¸é›ªçš„æ¸…æ–°ã€‚åŸºäº Next.js 16 App Router æ„å»ºï¼Œé›†æˆ Jotai çŠ¶æ€ç®¡ç†ã€Socket.IO å®æ—¶æ¨é€å’Œ Motion ç‰©ç†åŠ¨ç”»ï¼ŒLighthouse æ€§èƒ½è¯„åˆ†è¶… 90ã€‚æ”¯æŒ Markdown æ‰©å±•ã€å¤šè¯­è¨€ã€å®æ—¶æ´»åŠ¨çŠ¶æ€å±•ç¤ºï¼Œæä¾›ä¼˜é›…çš„å†™ä½œä¸é˜…è¯»ä½“éªŒã€‚
summary.en: Shiro is a minimalist personal website theme designed for the Mix Space ecosystem, embodying the purity of paper and freshness of snow. Built on Next.js 16 App Router with Jotai state management, Socket.IO real-time communication, and Motion physics-based animations, it achieves Lighthouse scores above 90. The theme features Markdown extensions, multilingual support via next-intl, real-time activity status, and a dedicated 'Recently' thoughts system, delivering an elegant writing and reading experience.

metadata.name: gitstars
metadata.description: Github Starred Repositories Manager

summary.en: Gitstars is a specialized GitHub starred repositories manager for developers. It addresses the challenge of finding repositories among numerous stars by offering categorization by topics/languages, README preview, and quick access. The built-in Gitstars Ranking updates daily with GitHub's top 100 starred projects across programming languages, enabling efficient discovery of quality open-source projects. One-click Vercel deployment enables private intelligent management of personal starred repositories.

metadata.name: newsnow
metadata.description: Elegant reading of real-time and hottest news

summary.zh: NewsNow æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾ä¼˜é›…çš„æ–°é—»èšåˆé˜…è¯»åº”ç”¨ï¼Œé‡‡ç”¨ Serverless æ¶æ„éƒ¨ç½²äº Cloudflareã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒäº®ç‚¹åŒ…æ‹¬è‡ªé€‚åº”çˆ¬è™«ç­–ç•¥ï¼ˆåŠ¨æ€è°ƒæ•´æŠ“å–é¢‘ç‡é˜²å°ç¦ï¼‰ã€GitHub OAuth ç™»å½•åŒæ­¥ã€30åˆ†é’Ÿæ™ºèƒ½ç¼“å­˜æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œä»¥åŠåˆ›æ–°çš„ MCP Server æ”¯æŒï¼Œå¯æ— ç¼æ¥å…¥ AI å·¥ä½œæµã€‚æä¾›ç®€æ´ UI ä¸å®æ—¶çƒ­ç‚¹æ–°é—»ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ D1 æ•°æ®åº“ä¸ Docker éƒ¨ç½²ï¼Œæ˜¯å¤šè¯­è¨€æ–°é—»å¹³å°çš„ç†æƒ³æŠ€æœ¯åº•åº§ã€‚
summary.en: NewsNow delivers elegant real-time news aggregation via Cloudflare Serverless stack. Core technical innovations include adaptive scraping with anti-ban intelligence (dynamic intervals, minimum 2 minutes), GitHub OAuth synchronization, 30-minute smart caching with force-refresh capability, and innovative MCP Server integration for AI workflows. It features clean UI, supports Cloudflare D1 database and Docker deployment, with extensible architecture for adding news sources and multi-language roadmap for global news platforms.

metadata.name: virtual-dsm
metadata.description: Virtual DSM in a Docker container.

summary.zh: vdsm/virtual-dsm æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ›æ–°çš„è½»é‡çº§ NAS è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œé€šè¿‡åœ¨ Docker å®¹å™¨ä¸­è™šæ‹ŸåŒ–è¿è¡Œ Synology DSM ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œç»“åˆ KVM ç¡¬ä»¶åŠ é€ŸæŠ€æœ¯å®ç°æ¥è¿‘åŸç”Ÿçš„æ€§èƒ½è¡¨ç°ã€‚é¡¹ç›®æ”¯æŒå¤šç£ç›˜ç®¡ç†ã€ç‰©ç†è®¾å¤‡ç›´é€šã€CPU ä¸å†…å­˜çµæ´»é…ç½®ï¼Œå¯å¿«é€Ÿéƒ¨ç½²äº Linuxã€Windows å’Œ macOS å¹³å°ï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºä¸ªäººç§æœ‰äº‘å­˜å‚¨ã€å¼€å‘æµ‹è¯•ç¯å¢ƒåŠè½»é‡çº§ç”Ÿäº§åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: vdsm/virtual-dsm is an innovative lightweight NAS solution that virtualizes Synology DSM within Docker containers, leveraging KVM hardware acceleration to deliver near-native performance. This project provides comprehensive storage virtualization capabilities including multi-disk management, raw device passthrough, and dynamic resource allocation for CPU and memory. With support for Docker Compose, Kubernetes, and GitHub Codespaces, it enables rapid deployment across Linux, Windows, and macOS platforms. The solution is particularly suited for personal cloud storage, development testing environments, and scenarios requiring flexible, containerized NAS infrastructure with enterprise-grade features.

summary.en: Fusion Monster (ECS) is a comprehensive server testing script for VPS benchmarking. The Go-based implementation eliminates environment dependencies, supports non-root execution, and maintains compatibility across multiple architectures (amd64/arm64/i386/arm) and Linux distributions. Core capabilities include CPU/memory/disk performance evaluation, triple-network routing analysis, multi-node speed tests, and IP quality validation via 15 databases. Features both interactive menu and headless parameter-driven modes, with customizable options for Geekbench versions, disk test utilities, and China-specific network endpoints, designed for developers and sysadmins.

summary.en: GitHubDaily is a decade-old open source curation platform that has shared over 10,000 high-quality projects. Through multiple channels including GitHub, WeChat, and Twitter, it systematically recommends technical tutorials, developer tools, and industry insights. Its core value lies in filtering high-value content from massive repositories and organizing it into structured categories like AI tools and development utilities, helping developers expand technical horizons and enhance programming skills.

metadata.name: Neurite
metadata.description: Fractal Graph-of-Thought. Rhizomatic Mind-Mapping for Ai-Agents, Web-Links, Notes, and Code.

summary.en: Neurite is an open-source fractal-based mind-mapping platform that merges chaos theory with graph theory to create an infinite-dimensional digital workspace. It interconnects AI agents, code snippets, notes, and web links as nodes in a rhizomatic structure. Key features include multi-agent UI collaboration, FractalGPT integration, a Neural API, and synchronized knowledge management. The system enables non-linear creative thinking by revealing hidden patterns through self-similar fractal geometries, transforming how complex information is organized and visualized.

summary.en: CS-Notes is a systematic knowledge repository specifically designed for technical interview preparation, encompassing core CS fundamentals including algorithms (LeetCode, å‰‘æŒ‡Offer solutions), operating systems, computer networks, database principles, Java internals (concurrency, JVM, I/O), and large-scale system design. It bridges theory with hands-on practice through extensive coding problems and architectural case studies, offering a complete skill development path from basic concepts to advanced engineering architecture for software engineers.

metadata.name: PaddleOCR
metadata.description: Turn any PDF or image document into structured data for your AI. A powerful, lightweight OCR toolkit that bridges the gap between images/PDFs and LLMs. Supports 100+ languages.

summary.en: PaddleOCR is an industrial-grade OCR toolkit powered by PaddlePaddle, designed for high-performance document intelligence. It supports 100+ languages and multimodal inputs (images/PDFs), delivering end-to-end text detection, recognition, and structure analysis. Key technical advantages include lightweight deployment, multi-hardware acceleration (CPU/GPU/XPU/NPU), and LLM-optimized structured outputs. Ideal for document digitization, form processing, invoice extraction, and AI-driven data pipelines, it seamlessly converts unstructured visual content into machine-readable formats for downstream applications requiring precise text extraction and semantic understanding.

summary.en: This repository delivers ultra-simplified explanations of software design patterns, demystifying 23 patterns across creational, structural, and behavioral categories through real-world analogies and PHP code examples. Its core value lies in dramatically lowering the learning curve by translating abstract concepts into relatable everyday scenarios, helping developers avoid over-engineering traps. Perfect for programming beginners and technical interview preparation, it serves as a practical, no-nonsense guide to mastering design patterns without unnecessary complexity or academic jargon.

metadata.name: generative-ai-for-beginners
metadata.description: 21 Lessons, Get Started Building with Generative AI

summary.zh: å¾®è½¯å®˜æ–¹å‡ºå“çš„ç³»ç»Ÿæ€§ç”Ÿæˆå¼AIå…¥é—¨æ•™ç¨‹ï¼ŒåŒ…å«21ä¸ªå®è·µè¯¾ç¨‹ï¼Œæ¶µç›–ä»åŸºç¡€ç†è®ºåˆ°åº”ç”¨å¼€å‘çš„å…¨æ ˆçŸ¥è¯†ã€‚é¢å‘åˆå­¦è€…è®¾è®¡ï¼Œæä¾›å¤šè¯­è¨€æ”¯æŒä¸å¼€æºç¤¾åŒºåä½œï¼Œå¸®åŠ©å¼€å‘è€…å¿«é€ŸæŒæ¡ç”Ÿæˆå¼AIåº”ç”¨æ„å»ºæŠ€èƒ½ã€‚å†…å®¹æƒå¨ä¸”æ˜“äºä¸Šæ‰‹ï¼Œé€‚åˆè‡ªå­¦ã€æ•™å­¦ä¸ä¼ä¸šåŸ¹è®­åœºæ™¯ã€‚
summary.en: Microsoft's official generative AI curriculum designed for beginners, offering 21 comprehensive lessons that take learners from foundational concepts to practical application development. This open-source project provides multi-language support through automated translations and encourages community contributions. Each lesson combines theoretical knowledge with hands-on coding exercises, covering essential topics like prompt engineering, model fine-tuning, and AI application deployment. With low barriers to entry and enterprise-grade content, it serves as an ideal learning path for individual developers, educators, and organizations seeking to build generative AI capabilities quickly and effectively.

summary.en: Hello Algo is a free open-source tutorial that demystifies data structures and algorithms through animated visualizations and interactive code execution. Supporting 12+ programming languages and four human languages, it offers smooth learning curves with visual explanations and hands-on practice. Ideal for beginners and interview candidates, it effectively bridges theory with implementation to build algorithmic thinking.

summary.en: Crawl4AI is an open-source, LLM-friendly web crawler designed for RAG, AI agents, and data pipelines. It converts web content into clean Markdown format optimized for language models. Key features include crash recovery for long-running deep crawls, prefetch mode for 5-10x faster URL discovery, and a self-hosting platform with enterprise-grade monitoring dashboard, REST API, and WebSocket streaming. Battle-tested by a 50k+ star community, it offers a cost-effective alternative to paid solutions with full local deployment capabilities and smart browser pool management.

metadata.name: readium
metadata.description: Read premium articles for free with this Bookmarklet

summary.en: Readium is a lightweight bookmarklet that bypasses paywalls to provide free access to premium content on platforms like Medium and Substack. Built with Vue.js and deployed on GitHub Pages, it offers a one-click solution without requiring browser extension installation. This portable tool leverages JavaScript to remove content restrictions, delivering a streamlined alternative to traditional ad-blockers or subscription management tools for effortless reading of gated articles. Its open-source nature ensures transparency and community-driven improvements.

metadata.name: macos
metadata.description: MacOS inside a Docker container.

summary.zh: è¯¥é¡¹ç›®é€šè¿‡Dockerå®¹å™¨åŒ–æŠ€æœ¯ç»“åˆKVMç¡¬ä»¶åŠ é€Ÿï¼Œåœ¨éAppleç¡¬ä»¶ä¸Šå®ç°macOSè™šæ‹ŸåŒ–ã€‚æä¾›Webç®¡ç†ç•Œé¢ï¼Œæ”¯æŒmacOS 11-15ç‰ˆæœ¬è‡ªåŠ¨éƒ¨ç½²ä¸çµæ´»èµ„æºé…ç½®ï¼ˆå­˜å‚¨/CPU/å†…å­˜ï¼‰ã€‚é€‚ç”¨äºiOS/macOSåº”ç”¨å¼€å‘æµ‹è¯•ã€CI/CDæµæ°´çº¿åŠè·¨å¹³å°å¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒï¼Œä¸ºå¼€å‘è€…æä¾›æ— éœ€Appleç¡¬ä»¶çš„macOSè™šæ‹ŸåŒ–è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚
summary.en: This project enables macOS virtualization on non-Apple hardware through Docker containerization with KVM hardware acceleration. It features web-based management, automated deployment of macOS versions 11-15 (Big Sur to Sequoia), and flexible configuration of storage, CPU, and RAM resources. Supporting Docker Compose, Kubernetes, and GitHub Codespaces deployment, it is ideal for iOS/macOS app development testing, CI/CD pipelines, and cross-platform development environments, providing developers with a convenient, production-ready macOS virtualization solution without Apple hardware requirements.

metadata.name: Docker-OSX
metadata.description: Run macOS VM in a Docker! Run near native OSX-KVM in Docker! X11 Forwarding! CI/CD for OS X Security Research! Docker mac Containers.

summary.en: Docker-OSX leverages KVM and OpenCore to run near-native macOS virtual machines inside Docker containers. It features X11 GUI forwarding and iPhone USB passthrough, specifically designed for macOS security research (including iMessage analysis) and CI/CD automation. This solution provides security researchers with a portable, isolated, and reproducible testing environment for efficient vulnerability discovery.

metadata.name: Jitterbug
metadata.description: Launch JIT enabled iOS app with a second iOS device

summary.zh: Jitterbug æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾åˆ›æ–°å·¥å…·ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ä¸¤å° iOS è®¾å¤‡é—´ WiFi é…å¯¹ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨ libimobiledevice å®ç°è·¨è®¾å¤‡è°ƒè¯•ï¼Œä»è€Œåœ¨éè¶Šç‹±è®¾å¤‡ä¸Šå¯ç”¨ JIT ç¼–è¯‘ã€‚å®ƒæ”¯æŒåˆ›å»º VPN éš§é“å®ç°è®¾å¤‡è‡ªè°ƒè¯•ï¼Œéœ€é…åˆå¼€å‘è€…é•œåƒä½¿ç”¨ã€‚ä¸»è¦åº”ç”¨äº iOS æ€§èƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–ã€æ¨¡æ‹Ÿå™¨å¼€å‘åŠé€†å‘å·¥ç¨‹ï¼Œä¸ºå¼€å‘è€…æä¾›ç»•è¿‡ç³»ç»Ÿé™åˆ¶çš„çµæ´»è°ƒè¯•æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚
summary.en: Jitterbug is an innovative debugging tool that enables JIT compilation on non-jailbroken iOS devices by leveraging WiFi pairing between two iOS devices through libimobiledevice. It facilitates tethered app launches with debugger attachment and creates VPN tunnels for self-debugging scenarios. The solution requires Developer Disk Images and supports installation via AltStore or sideloading. Primary use cases include iOS performance optimization, simulator development, and security research, offering developers a flexible approach to bypass Apple's JIT restrictions while maintaining device security integrity.

metadata.name: Deep-Live-Cam
metadata.description: real time face swap and one-click video deepfake with only a single image

summary.zh: Deep-Live-Cam æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾å®æ—¶æ¢è„¸ä¸æ·±åº¦ä¼ªé€ å·¥å…·ï¼Œä»…éœ€å•å¼ æºå›¾åƒå³å¯å®ç°ä¸€é”®è§†é¢‘æ¢è„¸ã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒæŠ€æœ¯åŒ…æ‹¬å®æ—¶é¢éƒ¨æ•æ‰ã€å˜´éƒ¨åŠ¨ä½œä¿ç•™ä¸å¤šäººè„¸æ˜ å°„ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ Windows/Mac å¹³å°ã€‚é€‚ç”¨äºå†…å®¹åˆ›ä½œã€ç›´æ’­è¡¨æ¼”ã€å½±è§†å¨±ä¹åŠè§†é¢‘èŠå¤©ç­‰åœºæ™¯ï¼Œå†…ç½®å†…å®¹å®¡æ ¸æœºåˆ¶ç¡®ä¿åˆè§„ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œå¼ºè°ƒè´Ÿè´£ä»»çš„ AI åº”ç”¨ã€‚
summary.en: Deep-Live-Cam is a real-time face swap and deepfake tool that enables one-click video face replacement with just a single source image. Key technical features include real-time facial capture, mouth mask for natural lip movement preservation, and multi-face mapping for simultaneous subject processing. It supports Windows/Mac platforms and serves content creation, live streaming, film entertainment, and video chat applications. The software incorporates built-in content moderation to prevent misuse and promotes responsible AI usage through ethical guidelines and consent requirements.

metadata.name: UTM
metadata.description: Virtual machines for iOS and macOS

summary.zh: UTM æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾åŸºäº QEMU çš„ iOS å’Œ macOS å…¨ç³»ç»Ÿè™šæ‹ŸåŒ–å·¥å…·ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ x86_64ã€ARM64ã€RISC-V ç­‰ 30 å¤šç§å¤„ç†å™¨æ¶æ„ã€‚å®ƒæä¾› JIT åŠ é€Ÿç‰ˆæœ¬å’Œæ— éœ€è¶Šç‹±çš„ SE è§£é‡Šå™¨ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œå¯åœ¨ iPhoneã€iPad å’Œ Mac ä¸Šè¿è¡Œ Windowsã€Linux ç­‰æ“ä½œç³»ç»Ÿã€‚åˆ©ç”¨ Hypervisor å’Œ Virtualization æ¡†æ¶å®ç°ç¡¬ä»¶åŠ é€Ÿï¼Œæ˜¯ç§»åŠ¨è®¾å¤‡å’Œæ¡Œé¢ç«¯çš„å¼ºå¤§è™šæ‹ŸåŒ–è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚
summary.en: UTM is a full-featured system emulator and virtual machine host for iOS and macOS, built on QEMU. It supports 30+ processor architectures including x86_64, ARM64, and RISC-V, enabling users to run Windows, Linux, and other operating systems on iPhones, iPads, and Macs. The platform offers JIT-based acceleration for optimal performance and a special SE (Slow Edition) using threaded interpretation that requires no jailbreak. With native frontends leveraging latest Apple APIs and hardware acceleration via Hypervisor.framework and Virtualization.framework, UTM delivers a powerful cross-platform virtualization solution for both mobile and desktop environments.

metadata.name: memcode
metadata.description: Flashcards. Beautiful. Effortless.

summary.zh: Memcode æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾ä¸“ä¸ºå¼€å‘è€…ä¸å­¦ä¹ è€…è®¾è®¡çš„ç°ä»£åŒ–é—´éš”é‡å¤é—ªå¡åº”ç”¨ã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒäº®ç‚¹åœ¨äºæ·±åº¦èåˆç¼–ç¨‹å­¦ä¹ åœºæ™¯ï¼Œæ”¯æŒä»£ç å—ã€LaTeXå…¬å¼ä¸å¤šåª’ä½“å†…å®¹ï¼Œå¹¶é›†æˆ OpenAI é«˜è´¨é‡æ–‡æœ¬è½¬è¯­éŸ³ã€‚å…¶ LLM å‹å¥½çš„çº¯æ–‡æœ¬å¯¼å…¥å¯¼å‡ºæ ¼å¼ï¼Œä¾¿äº AI è¾…åŠ©çŸ¥è¯†ç®¡ç†ï¼Œå®ç°ç¾è§‚ã€é«˜æ•ˆã€æ— æ‘©æ“¦çš„å­¦ä¹ ä½“éªŒã€‚
summary.en: Memcode is a modern spaced repetition flashcard app designed for developers and learners. It excels in programming education with support for code blocks, LaTeX formulas, and multimedia. Integrated OpenAI text-to-speech delivers high-quality audio, while LLM-friendly plain text import/export enables seamless AI-powered knowledge management, combining beauty with effortless learning.

metadata.name: Roo-Code
metadata.description: Roo Code gives you a whole dev team of AI agents in your code editor.

summary.zh: RooCodeæ˜¯VS Codeæ‰©å±•ï¼Œæä¾›å¤šæ¨¡å¼AIå¼€å‘å›¢é˜Ÿã€‚æ”¯æŒä»£ç ç”Ÿæˆã€æ¶æ„è®¾è®¡ã€è°ƒè¯•ã€æ–‡æ¡£ç¼–å†™ç­‰å…¨æµç¨‹ä»»åŠ¡ï¼Œé›†æˆMCPæœåŠ¡å™¨å®ç°å·¥å…·æ‰©å±•ï¼Œé€šè¿‡è‡ªç„¶è¯­è¨€æŒ‡ä»¤é©±åŠ¨AIä»£ç†å®Œæˆç¼–ç¨‹å·¥ä½œã€‚
summary.en: RooCode is a VS Code extension that embeds a complete AI-powered development team directly in your code editor. It provides specialized modes including Code for everyday tasks, Architect for system design, Ask for explanations, Debug for issue tracing, and customizable modes for team workflows. The extension integrates with MCP servers for extensible tooling and enables natural language-driven code generation, refactoring, debugging, documentation writing, and task automation.

summary.en: Open Canvas is LangChain's open-source AI document collaboration platform built on LangGraph multi-agent architecture. Key innovations include: built-in reflection agents with cross-session memory, starting from existing documents instead of chat-only, customizable quick actions, artifact versioning, and live code/Markdown editing. As an open alternative to OpenAI Canvas, it personalizes experiences by persisting user style rules and insights, ideal for writing, coding, and collaborative content creation.

summary.en: Maple Mono is an open-source monospace font designed to enhance coding workflow. Key features include rounded corners, smart ligatures, and comprehensive Nerd-Font icon integration. Its unique 2:1 Chinese-English width alignment ensures perfect visual harmony in multilingual code and Markdown tables. The V7 remake introduces variable font technology with infinite weight control and granular customization options, optimized for IDEs and terminals.

metadata.name: karakeep
metadata.description: A self-hostable bookmark-everything app (links, notes and images) with AI-based automatic tagging and full text search

summary.zh: Karakeep æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾è‡ªæ‰˜ç®¡çš„ä¹¦ç­¾ç®¡ç†å·¥å…·ï¼Œæ”¯æŒé“¾æ¥ã€ç¬”è®°ã€å›¾ç‰‡å’Œ PDF çš„æ”¶è—ã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒäº®ç‚¹åŒ…æ‹¬ AI è‡ªåŠ¨æ ‡ç­¾ä¸æ‘˜è¦ï¼ˆæ”¯æŒ ChatGPT å’Œæœ¬åœ° Ollama æ¨¡å‹ï¼‰ã€å…¨æ–‡æœç´¢ã€OCR æ–‡å­—è¯†åˆ«ï¼Œä»¥åŠå®Œæ•´çš„ç½‘é¡µä¸è§†é¢‘å½’æ¡£åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚æä¾›æµè§ˆå™¨æ’ä»¶ã€iOS/Android åº”ç”¨ï¼Œå¹¶å¯é€šè¿‡ RSS è‡ªåŠ¨æŠ“å–ã€‚åŸºäº NextJS å’Œ tRPC æ„å»ºï¼Œæ³¨é‡éšç§ä¸æ•°æ®è‡ªä¸»ï¼Œé€‚åˆæ•°å­—èµ„æ–™å›¤ç§¯è€…ã€‚
summary.en: Karakeep is a self-hostable bookmark manager designed for digital hoarders to collect links, notes, images, and PDFs. It leverages AI for automatic tagging and summarization, supporting both ChatGPT and local Ollama models. The app provides full-text search, OCR for image text extraction, and complete web/video archiving using monolith and yt-dlp. Available on web, mobile (iOS/Android), and browsers via extensions, it includes RSS auto-hoarding, REST API, and SSO. Built with NextJS, Drizzle ORM, and tRPC, it emphasizes privacy and data sovereignty.

summary.en: This project provides automated operations for serv00/hostuno free hosting. It enables batch deployment of proxy protocols (Argo+Vmess, Hy2, Socks5, MTProto) and applications like Alist and Nezha probe. Using GitHub Actions, it automates login keepalive, process protection, auto-update, and notifications, solving the maintenance pain points of free hosting for unattended continuous operation.

metadata.name: open-dev-data
metadata.description: A taxonomy for open source cryptocurrency, blockchain, and decentralized ecosystems

summary.en: Open Dev Data by Electric Capital is a structured taxonomy for blockchain and Web3 open-source ecosystems. It offers a CLI toolkit to export repository data in JSONL format with historical snapshots, integrates DuckDB for local high-performance analytics, and provides an interactive SQL interface. Developers can quickly analyze subsystem distributions and project evolution across ecosystems like Bitcoin and Ethereum, enabling precise ecosystem research.

metadata.name: supermemory
metadata.description: Memory engine and app that is extremely fast, scalable. The Memory API for the AI era.

summary.en: Supermemory is a high-performance, scalable AI memory engine positioned as your 'second brain.' Its core strength lies in MCP protocol integration, enabling seamless connectivity with AI tools like Claude and Cursor for intelligent memory retrieval and chat. It supports multi-format content import (URLs, PDFs, text) via browser extensions and Raycast. API-first design allows both personal knowledge management and enterprise workflow integration through its developer console, with self-hosting options available.

summary.zh: åŸºäº Cloudflare Pages å’Œ Next.js çš„ Serverless å›¾åºŠæœåŠ¡ã€‚åˆ©ç”¨ Cloudflare å…è´¹é¢åº¦å®ç°æ— é™å­˜å‚¨ä¸”é›¶æˆæœ¬è¿è¥ï¼Œæ— éœ€è‡ªå¤‡æœåŠ¡å™¨å’ŒåŸŸåã€‚é›†æˆå†…å®¹å®¡æ ¸ API è‡ªåŠ¨å±è”½ä¸è‰¯å›¾ç‰‡ï¼Œæä¾›å®Œæ•´çš„åå°ç®¡ç†ç³»ç»Ÿï¼Œæ”¯æŒè®¿é—®ç»Ÿè®¡ã€é»‘ç™½åå•ç®¡æ§ï¼Œå¹¶å¯é…ç½® Telegram æœºå™¨äººå®æ—¶é€šçŸ¥ã€‚
summary.en: A Serverless image hosting service built on Cloudflare Pages and Next.js. Offers unlimited storage at zero cost within Cloudflare's free tier, eliminating the need for self-hosted servers and domains. Features automated content moderation API for inappropriate images, a full-featured admin panel with access analytics, IP/referer whitelisting/blacklisting, and configurable Telegram bot notifications.

summary.en: tgState is an innovative file hosting system that leverages Telegram's Bot API and FileID mechanism to utilize Telegram channels/groups as unlimited-capacity storage backend. Supporting files of any size and format, it provides both web interface and API for uploads, functioning as image hosting or private cloud storage. Features flexible deployment via Docker, Vercel, or binary, with CloudFlare CDN integration for optimized content delivery.

summary.en: This project provides a one-click deployable Docker image acceleration service based on the official Registry, supporting proxies for Docker Hub, K8s, Quay, and other major registries. It features automatic reverse proxy (Nginx/Caddy) setup, cache control, IP whitelisting/blacklisting, and private image pulling to address slow downloads and rate limits in China. It can be deployed on private servers or free platforms like ClawCloud/Render, with a web management panel for image search and container monitoring.

metadata.name: pyvideotrans

summary.en: pyVideoTrans is a powerful open-source video translation toolkit that automates the entire pipeline from speech recognition to AI dubbing and subtitle embedding. It integrates local and cloud APIs for ASR, LLM translation, and TTS, featuring voice cloning (F5-TTS, CosyVoice), multi-role speaker diarization, and interactive proofreading. Supports both GUI and CLI operation across Windows, macOS, and Linux, enabling efficient batch processing and video localization for content creators and developers.

metadata.name: calibre
metadata.description: The official source code repository for the calibre ebook manager

summary.zh: calibre æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾åŠŸèƒ½å…¨é¢çš„ç”µå­ä¹¦ç®¡ç†å·¥å…·ï¼Œæ”¯æŒä¸»æµæ ¼å¼æŸ¥çœ‹ã€è½¬æ¢ã€ç¼–è¾‘ä¸ç¼–ç›®ã€‚å…¶æ ¸å¿ƒä¼˜åŠ¿åœ¨äºå¼ºå¤§çš„æ ¼å¼è½¬æ¢å¼•æ“ã€è·¨å¹³å°å…¼å®¹æ€§ï¼ˆLinux/Windows/macOSï¼‰ã€è®¾å¤‡åŒæ­¥èƒ½åŠ›ï¼Œä»¥åŠè‡ªåŠ¨æŠ“å–å…ƒæ•°æ®å’Œå°†æ–°é—»è½¬æ¢ä¸ºç”µå­ä¹¦çš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œæ˜¯æ„å»ºä¸ªäººæ•°å­—å›¾ä¹¦é¦†çš„ç†æƒ³è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚
summary.en: calibre is a comprehensive e-book management suite offering viewing, conversion, editing, and cataloging across major formats. Key strengths include a powerful conversion engine, cross-platform support (Linux/Windows/macOS), device synchronization, automated metadata fetching, and news-to-ebook conversion capabilities, making it ideal for personal digital library management.

summary.en: 233boy/v2ray is a Shell script tool focused on automated deployment and management of V2Ray. It simplifies complex configurations through minimal command-line interactions, enabling one-click installation, configuration management, and protocol switching. Key features include multi-protocol support (VMess/VLESS/Trojan/Shadowsocks), automated TLS certificate provisioning, concurrent multi-configuration operation, and dynamic port management. Ideal for rapidly deploying scientificä¸Šç½‘ proxy servers for privacy protection and network access needs.

summary.en: Umi-OCR is a free, open-source offline OCR software for Windows and Linux. It offers screenshot OCR, batch image/PDF processing, QR code recognition/generation, and formula recognition. Key technical features include a built-in high-efficiency offline engine (supporting Rapid-OCR and PaddleOCR), layout analysis and text post-processing (e.g., excluding watermarks/headers/footers), and support for CLI and HTTP API integration, meeting the needs for efficient, privacy-preserving local text recognition.

summary.en: This repository hosts multilingual localization resources for Dism++, a Windows system optimization utility. It provides translation files for 16+ languages covering both the application interface and official website. The project includes Data.xml with system cleanup rules and a crash statistics backend. Default development language is Simplified Chinese, maintained through global translator collaboration to ensure localization quality across all language versions.

summary.en: wxauto is a Python automation library for native Windows WeChat client (v3.9.X) that leverages UIAutomation technology to directly control the desktop application. It enables sending/receiving messages, building simple chatbots, and automating WeChat interactions without web versions. Compatible with Windows 10/11 and Python 3.9+, it serves personal automation needs. Important: Discontinued in October 2025, intended solely for educational and research purposes.

metadata.name: llm_aided_ocr
metadata.description: Enhances Tesseract OCR output using LLMs (local or API) for error correction, smart chunking, and markdown formatting of scanned PDFs

summary.zh: è¯¥é¡¹ç›®é€šè¿‡LLMå¢å¼ºä¼ ç»ŸOCRæµç¨‹ï¼Œæ˜¾è‘—æå‡æ‰«æPDFçš„è¯†åˆ«å‡†ç¡®ç‡ä¸å¯è¯»æ€§ã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒé‡‡ç”¨Tesseractè¿›è¡ŒåŸºç¡€OCRè¯†åˆ«ï¼Œå†åˆ©ç”¨æœ¬åœ°æˆ–APIå¤§æ¨¡å‹è¿›è¡Œæ™ºèƒ½çº é”™ã€åˆ†å—ä¸Markdownæ ¼å¼åŒ–ã€‚æ”¯æŒå¼‚æ­¥å¤„ç†ä¸GPUåŠ é€Ÿï¼Œé€‚ç”¨äºæ–‡æ¡£æ•°å­—åŒ–ã€æ¡£æ¡ˆç®¡ç†ç­‰åœºæ™¯ï¼Œæœ‰æ•ˆè§£å†³OCRå¸¸è§é”™è¯¯ä¸æ ¼å¼æ··ä¹±é—®é¢˜ã€‚
summary.en: This project enhances traditional OCR pipelines using LLMs to significantly improve accuracy and readability of scanned PDFs. It employs Tesseract for base OCR, then leverages local or API-based LLMs for intelligent error correction, smart chunking, and Markdown formatting. Key features include asynchronous processing, GPU acceleration for local inference, and flexible hybrid deployment. Designed for document digitization, archival management, and office automation, it effectively resolves common OCR errors, duplicate content, and formatting inconsistencies while preserving document structure.

metadata.name: koodo-reader
metadata.description: A modern ebook manager and reader with sync and backup capacities for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS and Web

summary.zh: Koodo Reader æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾å¼€æºçš„è·¨å¹³å°ç”µå­ä¹¦é˜…è¯»ç®¡ç†å·¥å…·ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ Windowsã€macOSã€Linuxã€Androidã€iOS åŠ Web å…¨å¹³å°ã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒäº®ç‚¹åŒ…æ‹¬ï¼šæ”¯æŒ EPUBã€PDFã€MOBI ç­‰ 15+ æ ¼å¼ï¼Œé›†æˆ OneDriveã€Google Drive ç­‰ 10+ äº‘å­˜å‚¨å®ç°æ•°æ®åŒæ­¥ï¼Œå†…ç½® AI è¯å…¸ç¿»è¯‘ä¸æ–‡æœ¬æœ—è¯»åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œæä¾›ä¸°å¯Œçš„é˜…è¯»è‡ªå®šä¹‰é€‰é¡¹ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸ªäººæ•°å­—é˜…è¯»ç®¡ç†çš„ç†æƒ³è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚
summary.en: Koodo Reader is an open-source, cross-platform ebook management and reading application supporting Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, iOS, and Web. Key features include: compatibility with 15+ formats including EPUB, PDF, and MOBI; seamless synchronization via 10+ cloud services like OneDrive and Google Drive; integrated AI-powered dictionary, translation and text-to-speech; extensive customization for fonts, themes and layouts. It provides a comprehensive solution for personal digital reading management across all devices.

summary.en: ddns-go is a lightweight Dynamic DNS client built with Golang, supporting 20+ major DNS providers like Aliyun, Tencent Cloud, Cloudflare and more. It automatically detects public IPv4/IPv6 address changes and synchronizes them to domain records in real-time, perfect for home broadband, small servers and IoT devices with dynamic IPs. The tool offers a user-friendly web interface, Docker deployment, system service integration, multi-platform compatibility (Windows/macOS/Linux, ARM/x86/RISC-V) and customizable webhook notifications.

metadata.name: BroadcastChannel
metadata.description: Turn your Telegram Channel into a MicroBlog.

summary.zh: BroadcastChannel æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäº Astro çš„å·¥å…·ï¼Œå¯å°† Telegram é¢‘é“è½¬åŒ–ä¸ºè½»é‡çº§å¾®å‹åšå®¢ã€‚å®ƒæ— éœ€æµè§ˆå™¨ç«¯ JavaScriptï¼Œæä¾› SEO å‹å¥½çš„ç«™ç‚¹åœ°å›¾å’Œ RSS è®¢é˜…ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ Cloudflareã€Vercel ç­‰æ— æœåŠ¡å™¨éƒ¨ç½²ã€‚ç”¨æˆ·åªéœ€é…ç½®é¢‘é“ç”¨æˆ·åï¼Œå³å¯å¿«é€Ÿæ­å»ºç‹¬ç«‹åšå®¢ï¼Œå®ç°å†…å®¹åŒæ­¥ä¸è‡ªå®šä¹‰åŸŸåç»‘å®šã€‚
summary.en: BroadcastChannel transforms your Telegram channel into a lightweight microblog using Astro. It requires zero client-side JavaScript, delivers SEO-friendly sitemaps and RSS feeds, and supports deployment on serverless platforms like Cloudflare and Vercel. Simply configure your channel username to launch a standalone blog with custom domain support.

metadata.name: web-archive
metadata.description: Free web archiving and sharing service based on Cloudflare. è·‘åœ¨ Cloudflare ä¸Šçš„å…è´¹ç½‘é¡µå½’æ¡£å’Œåˆ†äº«å·¥å…·ã€‚

summary.zh: åŸºäº Cloudflare çš„å…è´¹ç½‘é¡µå½’æ¡£æœåŠ¡ï¼Œé€šè¿‡æµè§ˆå™¨æ’ä»¶å°†é¡µé¢ä¿å­˜ä¸ºå•æ–‡ä»¶ HTMLï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨ Worker+D1+R2 å…¨æ ˆæ–¹æ¡ˆå®ç°ä½æˆæœ¬å­˜å‚¨ä¸æ£€ç´¢ã€‚é›†æˆ AI è‡ªåŠ¨æ ‡ç­¾åˆ†ç±»ã€æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ç®¡ç†ä¸é˜…è¯»æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œæ”¯æŒç§»åŠ¨ç«¯é€‚é…ï¼Œæä¾›å®Œæ•´çš„å½’æ¡£ã€æœç´¢ä¸åˆ†äº«åŠŸèƒ½ï¼Œé€‚åˆä¸ªäººçŸ¥è¯†æ²‰æ·€ã€‚
summary.en: Web Archive is a free, serverless web archiving and sharing service built entirely on Cloudflare's platform. It captures webpages as single-file HTML through a browser extension and stores them using Cloudflare D1 database and R2 storage via Workers. The platform features AI-powered automatic tag classification, folder organization, reading mode, mobile responsiveness, and searchable archives. Leveraging Cloudflare's generous free tier, it provides a cost-effective, scalable solution for personal knowledge management and digital content preservation.

metadata.name: TrollFools
metadata.description: In-place tweak injection with insert_dylib and ChOma.

summary.zh: TrollFools æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾ä¸“ä¸º TrollStore è®¾è®¡çš„è½»é‡çº§ tweak æ³¨å…¥å·¥å…·ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨ insert_dylib å’Œ ChOma å®ç° Mach-O äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶çš„åŸåœ°åŠ¨æ€åº“æ³¨å…¥ã€‚æ”¯æŒ iOS 14-17 ç³»ç»Ÿåº”ç”¨åŠ App Store åº”ç”¨çš„ä¿®æ”¹ï¼Œæ— è®ºæ˜¯è§£å¯†è¿˜æ˜¯åŠ å¯†çŠ¶æ€ã€‚é‡‡ç”¨ SwiftUI å¼€å‘ï¼Œç•Œé¢ç°ä»£ä¸”ä½“ç§¯å°å·§ï¼Œæ—¨åœ¨æ›¿ä»£æœ‰ç¼ºé™·çš„ optoolï¼Œä¸ºè¶Šç‹±ç¤¾åŒºæä¾›é«˜æ•ˆç¨³å®šçš„ tweak éƒ¨ç½²æ–¹æ¡ˆã€‚
summary.en: TrollFools is a lightweight tweak injection tool specifically designed for TrollStore ecosystem, leveraging insert_dylib and ChOma to perform in-place dynamic library injection directly into Mach-O binaries. It supports iOS 14-17, capable of modifying removable system applications, decrypted App Store apps, and even encrypted App Store apps with bare dynamic libraries. Written entirely in SwiftUI, it delivers a modern user interface while maintaining a small package size. The project aims to replace the problematic optool by compiling a statically linked install_name_tool, providing the jailbreak community with a more reliable and efficient solution for tweak deployment.

summary.en: unplugin-icons is a universal icon library leveraging Iconify, providing 200,000+ icons across 150+ sets. It enables on-demand loading to bundle only used icons, reducing bundle size. Compatible with major build tools (Vite, Webpack, Rollup) and frameworks (React, Vue 3, Svelte), it features auto-importing, custom icons, and SSR/SSG support without FOUC for modern web development.

metadata.name: llm-course
metadata.description: Course to get into Large Language Models (LLMs) with roadmaps and Colab notebooks.

summary.zh: è¿™æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå…è´¹çš„LLMç³»ç»Ÿå­¦ä¹ è¯¾ç¨‹ï¼Œæä¾›ä»æ•°å­¦åŸºç¡€åˆ°å·¥ç¨‹å®è·µçš„å®Œæ•´è·¯çº¿å›¾ã€‚è¯¾ç¨‹åˆ†ä¸ºä¸‰éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼šLLMåŸºç¡€ã€LLMç§‘å­¦å®¶ï¼ˆæ¨¡å‹æ„å»ºä¸ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼‰å’ŒLLMå·¥ç¨‹å¸ˆï¼ˆåº”ç”¨å¼€å‘ä¸éƒ¨ç½²ï¼‰ã€‚åŒ…å«å¤§é‡å®ç”¨çš„Google Colab notebooksï¼Œæ¶µç›–æ¨¡å‹å¾®è°ƒã€åˆå¹¶ã€é‡åŒ–ã€è¯„ä¼°ç­‰å®æˆ˜æŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œå¹¶é…å¥—è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–å·¥å…·ï¼Œé€‚åˆæƒ³æ·±å…¥LLMé¢†åŸŸçš„å¼€å‘è€…ã€‚
summary.en: This is a free, comprehensive LLM course offering structured learning paths from mathematical foundations to production deployment. The curriculum is divided into three parts: LLM Fundamentals, The LLM Scientist (focusing on building optimal models with cutting-edge techniques), and The LLM Engineer (covering application development and deployment). It provides extensive Google Colab notebooks for hands-on practice, including tools for fine-tuning, model merging, quantization, and automated evaluation. Based on the LLM Engineer's Handbook, it's designed for developers seeking practical LLM expertise.

metadata.name: frp-panel
metadata.description: a multi node frp webui and for https://github.com/fatedier/frp server and client management, which makes this project a Cloudflare Tunnel/Tailscale Funnel/Ngork platform and agent open source alternative

summary.zh: FRP-Panel æ˜¯ frp çš„å¼€æºå¯è§†åŒ–ç®¡ç†å¹³å°ï¼Œæä¾›é›†ä¸­å¼é…ç½®ã€å¤šèŠ‚ç‚¹ç¼–æ’ä¸è¾¹ç¼˜ Worker éƒ¨ç½²èƒ½åŠ›ã€‚é¡¹ç›®é‡‡ç”¨ Master-Server-Client æ¶æ„ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ WireGuard æ™ºèƒ½ç»„ç½‘ä¸åŠ¨æ€è°ƒåº¦ï¼Œå¯æ›¿ä»£ Cloudflare Tunnel ç­‰å•†ä¸šæœåŠ¡ï¼Œå¤§å¹…ç®€åŒ– NAT ç©¿é€ä¸å†…ç½‘æœåŠ¡æš´éœ²çš„è¿ç»´å¤æ‚åº¦ï¼Œå®ç°ç»Ÿä¸€è®¤è¯ä¸å®æ—¶ç›‘æ§ã€‚
summary.en: FRP-Panel is an open-source visual management platform for frp that provides centralized configuration, multi-node orchestration, and edge Worker deployment capabilities. Adopting a Master-Server-Client architecture, it supports WireGuard smart networking and dynamic scheduling, serving as a self-hosted alternative to commercial services like Cloudflare Tunnel. The platform significantly simplifies NAT traversal and internal service exposure operations while enabling unified authentication, real-time monitoring, and zero-configuration credential distribution across distributed environments.

metadata.name: enhanced-FaaS-in-China
metadata.description: æå‡éƒ¨ç½²åœ¨cloudflareã€vercelæˆ–netlifyçš„ç½‘é¡µåœ¨ä¸­å›½çš„è®¿é—®é€Ÿåº¦å’Œç¨³å®šæ€§ Improve the access speed and stability in China of web pages hosted on cloudflare, vercel or netlify by merely changing your CNAME record. cfä¼˜é€‰åŸŸå | cfä¼˜é€‰ip | cloudflare | vercel | netlify | åŠ é€Ÿ | å›½å†… | ä¸­å›½ | å¢ƒå†… | å¤§é™†

summary.zh: è¯¥é¡¹ç›®é€šè¿‡è‡ªå®šä¹‰CNAMEè§£æï¼Œä¼˜åŒ–Cloudflareã€Vercelå’ŒNetlifyæœåŠ¡åœ¨ä¸­å›½å¤§é™†çš„è®¿é—®ä½“éªŒã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒæœºåˆ¶æ˜¯å®šæ—¶æµ‹è¯•å„å¹³å°IPçš„é€Ÿåº¦ä¸ç¨³å®šæ€§ï¼Œä¼˜é€‰å‡ºæœ€ä½³èŠ‚ç‚¹å¹¶é…ç½®ä¸‰ç½‘è§£æï¼Œå°†å›½å†…æµé‡å¼•å¯¼è‡³æœ€ä¼˜çº¿è·¯ï¼Œæµ·å¤–ä½¿ç”¨å®˜æ–¹IPã€‚ç›¸æ¯”å®˜æ–¹Anycastå¸¸å°†æµé‡è·¯ç”±è‡³ä¸œå—äºšå¯¼è‡´æ‹¥å µï¼Œæ­¤æ–¹æ¡ˆèƒ½æœ‰æ•ˆæ”¹å–„æ™šé«˜å³°æ—¶æ®µçš„è®¿é—®é€Ÿåº¦å’Œè¿é€šæ€§ç¨³å®šæ€§ï¼Œä»…éœ€ä¿®æ”¹DNSè®°å½•å³å¯å®ç°ï¼Œç‰¹åˆ«é€‚åˆéƒ¨ç½²åœ¨æµ·å¤–FaaSå¹³å°çš„ä¸­æ–‡ç½‘ç«™åŠ é€Ÿã€‚
summary.en: This project enhances access speed and stability for websites hosted on Cloudflare, Vercel, or Netlify in mainland China through custom CNAME redirection. It automatically tests IPs from these platforms every 40 minutes, selecting optimal nodes for China's three major ISPs while using official IPs overseas. By bypassing problematic anycast routing that often directs Chinese traffic to Southeast Asia, it significantly improves connectivity during peak hours and prevents single-point failures. The solution requires only DNS configuration changes, making it ideal for accelerating Chinese access to overseas serverless deployments.

summary.zh: Bypass Paywalls Clean for Chrome æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾æµè§ˆå™¨æ‰©å±•ï¼Œæ—¨åœ¨å¸®åŠ©ç”¨æˆ·ç»•è¿‡æ–°é—»ç½‘ç«™å’Œåœ¨çº¿å‡ºç‰ˆç‰©çš„ä»˜è´¹å¢™é™åˆ¶ã€‚è¯¥æ‰©å±•é€šè¿‡å†…å®¹è„šæœ¬å’Œç½‘ç»œè¯·æ±‚æ‹¦æˆªæŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨æ£€æµ‹å¹¶è§„é¿ä»˜è´¹è®¢é˜…æç¤ºï¼Œä½¿ç”¨æˆ·èƒ½å¤Ÿå…è´¹è®¿é—®åŸæœ¬éœ€è¦ä»˜è´¹çš„å†…å®¹ã€‚æœ¬ä»“åº“ä¸ºæ‰©å±•çš„ä¸“å±æ”¯æŒä¸é—®é¢˜è¿½è¸ªå¹³å°ï¼Œä¸»ä»£ç å·²è¿ç§»è‡³ gitflic.ruã€‚
summary.en: Bypass Paywalls Clean for Chrome is a browser extension designed to help users bypass paywalls on news sites and online publications. It employs content scripts and network request interception to automatically detect and circumvent paywall restrictions, allowing free access to premium content. This repository serves as the dedicated support and issue tracking platform, with the main codebase having been migrated to gitflic.ru.

metadata.name: ArchiveBox
metadata.description: ğŸ—ƒ Open source self-hosted web archiving. Takes URLs/browser history/bookmarks/Pocket/Pinboard/etc., saves HTML, JS, PDFs, media, and more...

summary.zh: ArchiveBox æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾å¼€æºè‡ªæ‰˜ç®¡ç½‘é¡µå­˜æ¡£å·¥å…·ï¼Œæ”¯æŒä»æµè§ˆå™¨ä¹¦ç­¾ã€å†å²è®°å½•ã€Pocketã€Pinboard ç­‰å¤šæºå¯¼å…¥ URLï¼Œå®Œæ•´ä¿å­˜ HTMLã€JSã€PDFã€åª’ä½“æ–‡ä»¶ç­‰å†…å®¹ã€‚é‡‡ç”¨æ ‡å‡†åŒ–æ ¼å¼ï¼ˆWARCã€SQLiteã€JSONï¼‰ç¡®ä¿æ•°æ®é•¿æœŸå¯è¯»ï¼Œæä¾› CLIã€REST API å’Œ Webhook é›†æˆèƒ½åŠ›ã€‚é€‚ç”¨äºä¸ªäººçŸ¥è¯†ç®¡ç†ã€ä¼ä¸šè¯æ®ä¿å…¨åŠæ•°å­—èµ„äº§å¤‡ä»½ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ Docker å¿«é€Ÿéƒ¨ç½²ã€‚
summary.en: ArchiveBox is an open-source self-hosted web archiving solution that preserves web content from URLs, browser history, bookmarks, Pocket, Pinboard, and more. It captures comprehensive snapshots including HTML, JavaScript, PDFs, and media files in standardized formats (WARC, SQLite, JSON) ensuring long-term accessibility. The tool offers CLI, REST API, and webhook integrations for automation, with Docker support for easy deployment. Ideal for personal knowledge management, legal evidence preservation, and social media backup, it gives users full control over their archived data.

summary.en: RSSHub is the world's largest open-source RSS network with 5,000+ instances, transforming content from virtually any website (Weibo, Twitter, Zhihu, etc.) into standardized RSS feeds. Powered by an active community maintaining thousands of routes, it supports Docker, npm deployments and integrates with browser extensions for one-click subscription, serving as the ultimate decentralized information flow solution.

summary.en: Simple Live is a cross-platform live streaming aggregation application developed with Flutter 3.38 and Dart language. It integrates mainstream platforms including Huya, Douyu, Bilibili, and TikTok, providing a unified viewing experience. The project adopts a modular architecture with separate core library, console, mobile app, and TV client, supporting Android, iOS, Windows, macOS, Linux, and Android TV. Key features include real-time danmaku display and multi-platform synchronization. As an educational open-source project, it showcases practical implementations of live streaming protocol parsing and Flutter's full-platform development capabilities.

summary.en: KeymouseGo is a lightweight cross-platform automation tool that records mouse and keyboard actions into JSON5 scripts for playback. Supporting Windows/Linux/macOS, it offers both GUI and CLI modes with configurable execution count and hotkeys. Built on Python and pynput, it enables automating repetitive tasks like office work and testing without programming knowledge, serving as a compact alternative to key wizard software.

summary.en: edgetunnel 2.0 is a Cloudflare Workers/Pages-based edge computing tunnel solution with deep VLESS and Trojan protocol integration. It features a visual management panel for real-time configuration, log monitoring, and traffic statistics. The built-in subscription system auto-generates configurations compatible with Clash, Sing-box, Surge and other clients. Supporting custom ProxyIP, chain proxies, and optimized APIs, it accelerates performance across Windows, Android, iOS, macOS and router firmware with flexible deployment options.

summary.en: NotionNext is a static blog system built with Next.js and Notion API, supporting serverless deployment on platforms like Vercel. It offers multiple themes including Next, Medium, Hexo, and Fukasawa, integrates various comment systems such as Twikoo, Giscus, and Gitalk, and uses Tailwind CSS for responsive styling. The project enables creators to build personal blogs with zero server requirements, using Notion as a content management system, making professional website creation accessible to all creators without technical barriers.

summary.en: This script resolves DuckDNS's lack of IPv6 auto-update support by automatically submitting both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses via Shell. It detects NAT environments, provides one-click configuration with automated cron job setup, and is ideal for home servers and IoT devices. Lightweight design relies on curl and standard tools, ensuring direct execution on service-providing devices.

summary.en: PicX is a GitHub API-based online image hosting management tool that requires no download or installation. It supports drag-and-drop upload, batch operations, image compression, and watermarking, providing multiple link formats like Markdown/HTML. Through GitHub OAuth or Token authentication, users can leverage GitHub repositories as free image hosts, combined with CDNs like jsDelivr for high-speed access, making it an ideal image hosting solution for developers and technical writers.

metadata.description: Jailed in-app purchase cracker (iOS 12-16)

summary.zh: SatellaJailed æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾ä¸“ä¸º iOS 12-16 è®¾è®¡çš„åº”ç”¨å†…è´­ä¹°ç ´è§£å·¥å…·ï¼Œæ”¯æŒéè¶Šç‹±ï¼ˆjailedï¼‰å’Œéƒ¨åˆ†è¶Šç‹±è®¾å¤‡ã€‚é€šè¿‡åŠ¨æ€åº“æ³¨å…¥æŠ€æœ¯ï¼Œå®ƒèƒ½åœ¨åº”ç”¨è´­ä¹°æµç¨‹ä¸­æ‹¦æˆªå¹¶ç»•è¿‡è‹¹æœçš„æ”¯ä»˜éªŒè¯æœºåˆ¶ã€‚å·¥å…·æä¾›ä¸‰ç§å®‰è£…æ–¹å¼ï¼šç”µè„‘è„šæœ¬è‡ªåŠ¨æ‰“è¡¥ä¸ã€Azula åº”ç”¨è¡¥ä¸å’Œ Esign ç­¾åé›†æˆï¼Œæ”¯æŒ TrollStore å’Œ Dopamine ç¯å¢ƒã€‚ä½¿ç”¨æ—¶å‘èµ·è´­ä¹°åå–æ¶ˆç¡®è®¤å¼¹çª—å³å¯ã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½é»˜è®¤å¯ç”¨ï¼ŒiOS 15+ ç”¨æˆ·å¯å¼€å¯é«˜çº§é€‰é¡¹ã€‚æ³¨æ„å¹¶éæ‰€æœ‰åº”ç”¨éƒ½å…¼å®¹ã€‚
summary.en: SatellaJailed is an iOS 12-16 in-app purchase cracker designed for jailed and partially jailbroken devices. It employs dynamic library injection to intercept and bypass Apple's payment verification during purchase flows. The tool offers three installation methods: computer-based script patching, Azula app patching, and Esign signature integration, compatible with TrollStore and Dopamine environments. Users initiate a purchase and cancel the Apple ID confirmation popup to activate. Core functionality is enabled by default, with advanced features available for iOS 15+. Note that not all applications are supported, and success rates may vary depending on the target app.

metadata.description: ç¨‹åºå‘˜å»¶å¯¿æŒ‡å— | A programmer's guide to live longer

summary.zh: æœ¬æŒ‡å—ä¸“ä¸ºç¨‹åºå‘˜è®¾è®¡ï¼ŒåŸºäºå…¨å› æ­»äº¡ç‡ï¼ˆACMï¼‰å­¦æœ¯è¯æ®ï¼Œæä¾›é‡åŒ–å»¶å¯¿ç­–ç•¥ã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒé€šè¿‡ä¼˜åŒ–é¥®é£Ÿï¼ˆå¦‚è”¬æœã€åšæœæ‘„å…¥é™ä½27% ACMï¼‰ã€è¿åŠ¨ï¼ˆæŒ¥æ‹è¿åŠ¨é™47% ACMï¼‰åŠç”Ÿæ´»ä¹ æƒ¯ï¼ˆ7å°æ—¶ç¡çœ ï¼‰ï¼Œç›®æ ‡é™ä½66.67% ACMå¹¶å¢åŠ 20å¹´é¢„æœŸå¯¿å‘½ã€‚äº®ç‚¹åœ¨äºç»“æ„åŒ–è¾“å…¥-è¾“å‡ºæ¡†æ¶åŠäº‰è®®æ•°æ®å¤„ç†ï¼Œç›´å‡»ä¹…åèŒä¸šå¥åº·ç—›ç‚¹ã€‚
summary.en: Tailored for programmers, this guide leverages all-cause mortality (ACM) research to deliver quantified longevity strategies. Key actions include dietary optimization (e.g., fruits/nuts reducing ACM by 27%), racket sports (47% ACM reduction), and sleep management (7-hour optimum), targeting 66.67% ACM decrease and ~20-year lifespan gain. Unique for its input-output framework and evidence-based controversy analysis, addressing sedentary occupational health risks.

summary.en: PicGo is the ultimate image uploader for efficient creators, seamlessly integrating with Obsidian, VS Code, Typora and other editors. Supporting 60+ image hosts (GitHub, Alibaba Cloud OSS, AWS S3), it enables instant uploads via drag-and-drop/clipboard/hotkeys with auto-copied links. Its extensible plugin system adds support for Cloudflare R2 and more, eliminating context switching to maximize creative focus.

It offers advanced and batch modes, parallel processing, intelligent caching, and seamless Calibre library integration, delivering a robust solution for cross-language reading and ebook localization with extensive customization options and format compatibility.

summary.en: Telegraph-Image is a free image hosting solution using Cloudflare Pages and Telegram Channel as a Flickr/imgur alternative. summary.zh: Pull æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾ GitHub Appï¼Œé€šè¿‡è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ– PR ä¿æŒ fork ä»“åº“ä¸ä¸Šæ¸¸åŒæ­¥ã€‚åŸºäº Deno 2.0 å’Œ TypeScript æ„å»ºï¼Œæ”¯æŒ mergeã€squashã€rebase å’Œç¡¬é‡ç½®ç­‰å¤šç§åŒæ­¥ç­–ç•¥ã€‚å¯å®šæ—¶æ£€æµ‹ä¸Šæ¸¸å˜æ›´ï¼Œè‡ªåŠ¨åˆ›å»º PR å¹¶åˆ†é…å®¡æŸ¥è€…ï¼Œå…¼å®¹åˆ†æ”¯ä¿æŠ¤è§„åˆ™ã€‚æä¾›çµæ´»çš„ YAML é…ç½®ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ GitHub Enterprise Serverï¼Œè§£å†³äº†å¼€å‘è€…ç»´æŠ¤ fork æ—¶çš„æ‰‹åŠ¨åŒæ­¥ç—›ç‚¹ï¼Œæå‡å¼€æºåä½œæ•ˆç‡ã€‚
summary.en: Pull is a GitHub App that automates fork synchronization with upstream repositories via pull requests. Built on Deno 2.0 and TypeScript, it supports configurable merge strategies including merge, squash, rebase, and hard reset. The app periodically checks for upstream changes, automatically creates PRs with assignees and reviewers, and respects branch protection rules. With flexible YAML configuration and GitHub Enterprise Server support, it eliminates manual fork maintenance overhead and streamlines open-source collaboration workflows.

summary.en: This repository maintains a continuously updated list of 312 free ChatGPT mirror sites, offering developers, researchers, and general users easy access to AI models like GPT-4, Claude, and DeepSeek without login or low barriers. It categorizes sites by free tiers, login requirements, and model support, while providing alternatives, self-hosting guides, prompt engineering resources, and developer tools for convenient AI tool discovery and implementation.

summary.en: This repository hosts cross-disciplinary e-books curated by 'ProgramThink', covering politics, technology, and more. Its core innovation leverages Resilio Sync P2P technology for decentralized distribution, enabling censorship-resistant, auto-syncing downloads without VPN. It provides comprehensive format support (PDF/EPUB/MOBI) and detailed technical guides, forming a robust anti-censorship digital knowledge dissemination system.

summary.en: A comprehensive directory of self-hostable open-source network services and web applications spanning communications, storage, management, media, and dozens of categories. It enables private deployment alternatives to SaaS, empowering data sovereignty, privacy protection, and infrastructure autonomy. Continuously maintained with automated dead link validation and project health monitoring, it serves as the definitive reference for building and maintaining a self-hosted server ecosystem.

metadata.description: ChirmyRam OneDrive Repository

summary.en: A massive OneDrive-based media repository totaling 150TB+ across nine dedicated drives for animations, movies, TV series, 4K ISOs, and e-books. The project implements multi-account load balancing via alist (Golang) to overcome API throttling, offering WebDAV and Rclone access protocols. Content is dual-indexed by Chinese pinyin and English names, primarily in MKV format with embedded subtitles. Key technical features include single-binary deployment, abstracted multi-drive management, and comprehensive media player recommendations for optimal playback experience.

summary.en: An open-source cooking guide specifically designed for programmers, reconstructing recipes with code-like thinking. Each dish features precise ingredient lists, standardized procedures, and quantified cooking parameters as rigorously as writing code. The project includes engineering features like Docker deployment, CI/CD automation, and PDF export, with a complete contribution system. Through technical metaphors and structured documentation, it transforms cooking into a programmable deterministic process, lowering the barrier for programmers to cook at home.

metadata.name: bilingual_book_maker
metadata.description: Make bilingual epub books Using AI translate

summary.zh: bilingual_book_maker æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾åŸºäº AI çš„ç”µå­ä¹¦åŒè¯­ç¿»è¯‘å·¥å…·ï¼Œæ”¯æŒ epub/txt/pdf/srt æ ¼å¼ã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒäº®ç‚¹åŒ…æ‹¬ï¼šé›†æˆ GPT-4ã€Claudeã€Gemini ç­‰å¤šæ¬¾å¤§æ¨¡å‹ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ litellm ç»Ÿä¸€ç®¡ç†é OpenAI æ¨¡å‹ï¼›æ”¯æŒä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡æ„ŸçŸ¥ç¿»è¯‘ä¿æŒè¯­ä¹‰è¿è´¯ï¼›è‡ªåŠ¨åœ¨å¤šæ¨¡å‹é—´è´Ÿè½½å‡è¡¡è§„é¿é€Ÿç‡é™åˆ¶ï¼›æä¾› CLI å‘½ä»¤è¡Œå·¥å…·ï¼Œä¸“ä¸ºå…¬ç‰ˆä¹¦è®¾è®¡ï¼Œé¿å…ç‰ˆæƒé£é™©ã€‚
summary.en: bilingual_book_maker is an AI-powered tool for creating bilingual e-books from epub/txt/pdf/srt files. Key features: integrates multiple LLMs including GPT-4, Claude, and Gemini via litellm for unified non-OpenAI model management; context-aware translation preserves semantic coherence across paragraphs; automatic load balancing across models prevents rate limiting and optimizes API costs; provides CLI for batch processing; specifically designed for public domain works to avoid copyright infringement risks while supporting parallel API keys.
